n. 虚伪；伪善 同义词:untruthfulness, falsity With people of only moderate ability is mere honesty ; but with those who possess great talent it is hypocrisy .就平庸之辈而言，谦虚只是诚实，但对于超凡拔萃的人来说，谦虚反而是虚伪。
n. 假设 同义词:tentative His hypothesis turned out to be correct .事实证明他的假设是正确的。
n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石 vt. 冰镇；结冰 vi. 结冰 adj. 冰的 同义词:gelato, reservedness, glacial In winter, the weather in the North can ice people's breath.冬天，北方的天气冷得可以使人们呼出的呵气立即结冰。
adj. 理想的；完美的；想象的；不切实际的 n. 理想；典范 同义词:perfect, full, unreasonable, dream, pink, quintessence She is the ideal girl .她是我理想的女孩。
vt. 确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致 同义词:confirm, recognize, ascertain, cotton, square He identified his baggage among hundreds of others.他在几百件行李中认出了自己的行李。
adj. 不光彩的；卑鄙的；卑贱的 同义词:poor, mean, low, base, dirty Ignoble fear in the face of danger or pain.他在危险面前总是镇静自若。

adj. 无知的；愚昧的 同义词:dark, empty, innocent If so , ignorant investor may pick and choose at random , knowing that her selections will be priced as keenly as any others .如果是这样的话，无知的投资人就可以随机选取，因为她知道自己所选资产的价格会和其他资产一样公道。
adj. 无礼的；粗野的；态度恶劣的 同义词:robust, gross, rough, country, bush A youth, especially one who is inexperienced, awkward, or ill - mannered .对这样一个莽汉的这些粗鲁无礼的话我是不会往心上放的。
adj. 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的 n. 文盲 同义词:letterless, unlettered, unschooled, analphabetic Her powers had received no aid from education : she was ignorant and illiterate .她的才能没能得到教育的帮助，她蒙昧无知。
adj. 不合逻辑的；不合常理的 同义词:incoherent To go a longer way , away from the most efficient path, seems illogical and time - wasting .不借助最有效地途径走很长的路这好像不合逻辑的，也是浪费时间的。

n. 照明；[光] 照度；启发；灯饰（需用复数）；阐明 同义词:lumination, luminous intensity A little bit of knowledge illuminates much around it, and that new illumination feeds on itself , so one corner explodes .一点点知识就可以阐释周围的许多现象，而新的阐释又启发了知识自身，于是知识的角落迅速扩大。
n. 说明；插图；例证；图解 同义词:explanation, notes, legend, diagram This " top " is meant to get enough mud into the well to stop the flow of oil ( see illustration below ).这次“封顶”是是往井内灌入大量泥浆，堵住原油的涌出（见下面的图解）。
n. 影像；想象；肖像；偶像 vt. 想象；反映；象征；作…的像 同义词:icon, portrait, indicate, vision, glass, figure a warrior imaged in bronze用青铜铸成的武士
n. 祭物，供奉牲礼；宰杀，祭品 同义词:offering, sacrifice Immolation Arrow - Increased base duration by 33%.牺牲之箭-基期增加了33％。
adj. 不朽的；神仙的；长生的 n. 神仙；不朽人物 同义词:eternal, monumental, jinnee, djinni You have placed his immortal soul in jeopardy .你已经陷害了他永生的灵魂。
adj. 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的 v. 迫近；悬空（impend的现在分词） 同义词:pressing, stringent, threatening Did you get the memo impending merger ?你收到近期要合并的备忘录了吗？
adj. 感觉不到的；极细微的 同义词:pretersensual Fred gave his team an almost imperceptible shake of his head.佛瑞德给了他的小队一个几乎察觉不到的摇头。
adj. 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的 n. 纸张尺寸；特等品 同义词:august, sovereign The dikes of imperial snobbery holdback a raging sea of color .势利的英帝国堤坝阻挡着狂怒的有色人种的海洋。
adj. 客观的；非个人的；没有人情味的；非人称的 n. 非人称动词；不具人格的事物 同义词:objective A safe topic of conversation between strangers in Britain is the weather -- unemotional and impersonal .在英国，陌生人之间的合适的话题是天气??因为这不涉及情感与个人隐私。
n. 含义；暗示；牵连，卷入 同义词:connotation, meaning, import, involvement, reminder But the other implication is not so easily proved .但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。
n. 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性 vt. 输入，进口；含…的意思 vi. 输入，进口 同义词:significance, stress, value, weight, meaning, to input, type in, to input, type in imported goods进口货
vi. 利用；欺骗；施加影响 vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗 同义词:do with, trade on, force, levy tax to impose duties on imported wines向进口酒征税
n. 不可能；不可能的事 同义词:a blue moon To keep cool in this weather is impossibility .在这样的天气要保持凉爽是不可能的。
vt. 使贫穷；使枯竭 同义词:pauperize, beggar a village impoverished by flood被洪灾弄得贫困的村庄
n. 令人难忘；印象性；感人 In addition to the impressiveness of the settings , there is a use of the camera , which at times seems magical .除了背景的感人情景外，还有电影摄影机的使用，有时候摄影机好像变魔术似的。
vt. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供 vi. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合 同义词:extemporize to improvise a song即兴创作一首歌曲
n. 冲动；[电子] 脉冲；刺激；神经冲动；推动力 vt. 推动 同义词:stimulus, pulse, incentive, excitement, needle, drive, force, impel Some dim impulse moved the policeman to look suspiciously at Tom .一点模糊的冲动促使警察疑心地看着汤姆。
n. 无能力；无才能 同义词:incapacity, incompetency This is viewed as a consequence of our inability to understand and treat a complex problem .人们把这看成是我们不能很好理解和处理复杂问题的结果。
adj. 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的 IT IS usually agreed that casinos should , in the public interest , be inaccessible and expensive .大家通常认为，为了保证公共利益，应该提高赌场的门槛和成本。
n. 静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性 同义词:rest, stillness There are three states of such inactivity .这种不活跃有三种情况。
adv. 不适当地；不够好地 同义词:improperly, inappropriately For example , do you arrive at interviews inadequately prepared ?例如，你是否准备不充分就去参加面试了？
adv. 顺便；偶然地；附带地 同义词:passingly, accidentally Dr. Watson , incidentally was American - born , which shows that basic science is international .出于偶然，沃森博士出生于美国，这表明，基础科学是国际性的。
adj. 险恶的；气候严酷的；狂风暴雨的 同义词:nasty, pernicious The inclement weather brought forth a host of diseases .恶劣的天气引起了种种疾病。
n. 倾向，爱好；斜坡 同义词:tendency, liability, hill, trend, interest Desire or inclination .欲望或倾向。
adj. 趋向于…的 v. 使…倾向（incline的过去分词） The road inclines upward.这条路向上倾斜。
n. 不便；麻烦 vt. 麻烦；打扰 同义词:trouble, headache, go to trouble, bother Do not inconvenience yourself for my sake.不要因我而太麻烦你自己。

adj. 现任的；依靠的；负有职责的 n. 在职者；现任者；领圣俸者 同义词:dependent, anaclitic The independent candidate also is especially critical of incumbent President Roh Moo-hyun's engagement policy with North Korea .这位无党派候选人还尤其批评了现任总统卢武铉对北朝鲜的接触政策。
vt. 招致，引发；蒙受 同义词:invite, court, secure, spell, trigger to incur somebody's displeasure引起某人的不快
adj. 不能治愈的；无可救药的 n. 患不治之症者，不能治愈的人 同义词:uncurable, unredeemable About 600 people throughout the world suffer from the incurable FOP .全球约有600人确诊患有该症，暂时未有医治方法。
adj. 难下定义的；难确定的；模糊不清的 n. 难下定义的事物；难以确切描述的事物 同义词:ambiguous, blurred The vision leaves an indefinable longing and regret .这种景象留给人们一种莫名的渴望和遗憾。
adj. 印度的；印第安人的；印第安语的 n. 印度人；印第安人；印第安语 同义词:hindu, Injun, Red Indian The Indian government liked what he did and gave him prizes for it .印度政府喜欢他所做的事情并因此给予他奖励。

n. 指示，指出；迹象；象征 同义词:instruction, symbol, breath, pointing, evidence One indication that this may be what Sinochem is planning is that it has not yet appointed an adviser .这或许正是中化的打算，有一个迹象可以证明这一点：该公司迄今尚未指定交易顾问。
adv. 冷淡地；漠不关心地；平庸地；相当差地 同义词:strange, nonchalantly He indifferently upon subjects that did not interest him .他对于那些引不起他兴趣的课题非常“冷淡”。
n. 消化不良；不消化 同义词:maldigestion, apepsia Has Wall Street 's alphabet soup given you investing indigestion ?华尔街的“字母汤”是否让你产生了“投资性”消化不良？
n. 侮辱；轻蔑；有伤尊严；无礼举动 同义词:despite, contumely Citizens of a superpower again had to bear the indignity of sugar rations .超级大国的公民不得不又一次忍受食糖定量供应的羞辱。
n. 微恙；不愿意；嫌恶 同义词:unwillingness, reluctation If have indisposition or have any problem again with I respond .如果有任何问题或不舒服再跟我反应。
adj. 个人的；个别的；独特的 n. 个人，个体 同义词:personal, different, subjective, distinct, unique, unity, private person At the individual level , no one can blame these graduates .从个人层面讲，谁都无权指责这些毕业生。
n. 印尼，印度尼西亚（东南亚岛国） Indonesia duly agreed to share its virus samples again .印尼也适时地同意再次分享其病毒样品。
vt. 诱导；引起；引诱；感应 同义词:attract, produce, cause, operate, occasion These attractions induce people to travel in that country.这些诱人之处吸引人们到那个国家去旅游。
n. 实业家；工业家；产业工人 同义词:city man Alfred Nobel , the great Swedish inventor and industrialist .阿尔弗雷德·诺贝尔，伟大的瑞典发明家和实业家。
adj. 勤勉的 同义词:diligent, hard-working This saying , therefore , teaches us to be industrious .因此，这句格言教导我们要勤奋用功。
n. 不适当，不合适；不称职；愚笨 同义词:inadequacy, impropriety Their ineptitude has done far more than their eventual decision to call in the IMF to damage the euro .如此举措失当对欧元造成的伤害高出最终求助IMF之决定远甚。
n. 绝无错误；无过失 For the secret of rulership is to combine a belief in one 's own infallibility with the Power to learn from past mistakes .因为统治的秘诀就是把相信自已的一贯正确同从过去错误汲取教训的能力结合起来。
n. 婴儿；幼儿；未成年人 adj. 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的 同义词:baby, minor, earlier, young, baby, minor, tender Objective To study the clinical value of parotid gland hemangioma operation in infant .目的了解手术治疗婴幼儿腮腺血管瘤的临床价值。
vt. 感染，传染 同义词:affect, contract, catch, disease, communicate She was infected with tuberculosis.她被传染上了肺结核。

adj. 无限的，无穷的；无数的；极大的 n. 无限；[数] 无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间） 同义词:huge, tremendous, thousand, million, boundless, Mugen, immenseness We must accept finite disappointment , but we must never lose infinite hope .我们必须接受有限的失望，但是不能失去无限的希望。
vt. 造成；使遭受（损伤、痛苦等）；给予（打击等） 同义词:afford, create, allow, extend, deal to inflict a fatal blow on the enemy给敌人致命一击
adj. 红外线的 同义词:infared Ethylene and - dichloroethylene are both inactive in the infra -red in this region .乙烯和反式二氯乙烯在红外光谱的这个区域都无活性。
adj. 固有的；内在的；与生俱来的，遗传的 同义词:internal, native, intrinsic, immanent First , you can milk underlying patterns inherent in chaotic systems to make good predictions .首先，你可以抽取混沌系统固有的基本模式，取得良好的预测。
vt. 继承；遗传而得 vi. 成为继承人 同义词:succeed to, take sth over to inherit a fortune继承财产
adj. 最初的；字首的 vt. 用姓名的首字母签名 n. 词首大写字母 同义词:premier, original an initialed handkerchief绣有姓名首字母的手帕
n. 主动权；首创精神 adj. 主动的；自发的；起始的 同义词:pioneering spirit, autonomous, active, spontaneous Will the aid of naval gunfire , the ground troops regained the initiative .我们的地面部队，在海军炮火掩护下，遂将主动权夺回。
vt. 注入；注射 同义词:breathe into, inflood to inject somebody with new drugs给某人注射新药
adj. 心底的，内心深处的；最深的 同义词:deepest, benmost Will light the inmost shrine of my heart ?会照亮我内心深处秘密的圣殿吗？
adj. 内部的；内心的；精神的 n. 内部 同义词:internal, mental, inside, spiritual, interior, inside He understands the inner workings of financial markets .他理解金融市场的内部运行方式。
adj. 无数的，数不清的 同义词:thousand, countless, million, infinite The sum total of innumerable relative truths constitute absolute truth .无数相对的真理之总和，就是绝对的真理。
n. 探究；调查；质询 同义词:investigation, exploration, probe, research, search We shall be glad to have your specific inquiry .如能得到贵特殊的询价，则甚为感谢。
n. 涌入；侵入；流入 同义词:penetration, intrusion Inrush current discrimination is one of the most important factors that influence protection performance .励磁涌流问题是影响变压器差动保护性能的重要因素。
n. 题词；铭文；刻印 同义词:epigraph, mintage The donor engraved the following inscription upon it .捐献者在它上面刻下了如下铭文。
adj. 吃昆虫的 An insect - eating bat roosting in a tree .栖息于椰子树上的食虫蝙蝠。
vt. 暗示；使逐渐而巧妙地取得；使迂回地潜入 vi. 暗讽；说含沙射影的话 同义词:imply, hint at, speak at to insinuate oneself into one's confidence巧妙地取得某人的信任
n. 灵感；鼓舞；吸气；妙计 同义词:stimulation, afflatus Insomnia is my greatest inspiration .失眠是我最大的灵感。
adj. 立即的；紧急的；紧迫的 n. 瞬间；立即；片刻 同义词:immediate, urgent, emergency, hot, pressing, moment, breath, second The penalty for helping Jews was instant execution .帮助犹太人的面临的处罚是立即处决。
adv. 即刻；突如其来地 同义词:eftsoon, swiftly Tom Ray showed that in his world of self- replicators , variable genome length emerged instantaneously .汤姆•雷指出，在他的自我复制基因世界里，可变的基因组长度在瞬间出现。
vt. 开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼） n. 学会，协会；学院 同义词:found, construct, father, initiate, academy, college, union, school to institute a government建立政府
n. 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗 同义词:system, convention Once more , the markets seem to be hanging on the fate of one big financial institution .各大金融市场的走向似乎再一次系于某家大型金融机构的命运。

n. （思想、观点等）偏狭，性僵化；岛国性质（或状态）；岛屿生活状况，与外界隔绝的生活状况 同义词:parochialism, intolerance The cultural insularity of music today is not simply the consequence of deficient pedagogy or propagation .今日音乐的文化隔绝状态并不简单是教育和传播的缺乏引起的。
adj. 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的 同义词:burning, stressed, sharp, warm, hot Depression is a medical condition that causes intense feelings of sadness .抑郁症是一种导致强烈悲伤情绪的身体状态。
n. 内部；本质 adj. 内部的；国内的；本质的 同义词:essence, principle, texture, entity, inner, inner, domestic, essential, inside, home Some think he was an interior designer .有人说野口勇是室内设计师。
adv. 无限地；漫无止境地 同义词:infinitely, unlimitedly To ponder interminably over the reason for one's own existence or the meaning of life in general seems to me .对我而言，我们若不断思考自己为何会存在于世以及生命的一般意义究竟为何。
vt. 说明；口译 vi. 解释；翻译 同义词:say, bring sb to do sth, account, translate to interpret a term解释一个词语
n. 间隔；间距；幕间休息 同义词:separation, distance Continuation of play after the interval was ruled out by rain .原定茶点小憩后继续进行的比赛因下雨而取消了。
vi. 干涉；调停；插入 同义词:influence in, meddle in to intervene between two objects插入两物体之间
n. 接见，采访；面试，面谈 vt. 采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试 同义词:audience, cover, to receive to interview the president采访总统
vt. （使）交织；织进；（使）混杂 同义词:raddle to interweave a wool warp with a silk weft以羊毛为经蚕丝为纬进行编织
adj. 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的 n. 知己；至交 vt. 暗示；通知；宣布 同义词:private, close, perfect, chamber, confidant, alter ego, bill, message He intimated to me his intention of leaving early.他向我暗示他要早些离开。
n. 暗示；告知；讽示 同义词:connotation, reminder, implication, allusion A frown is often intimation of disapproval .“皱眉头”常常表示不赞许。
adv. 到难耐的程度；无法忍受地 As an exceptionally intelligent girl , loving literature , she found her society intolerably narrow .她是一个极其聪慧的女郎，喜欢文学，觉得她那个社会狭隘得让人难以忍受。
adj. 无畏的；勇敢的；勇猛的 同义词:game, brave, dauntless His intrepid adversary prepared to close for the thirteenth time.他那勇敢的对手准备打第十三回合。
n. 阴谋；诡计；复杂的事；私通 vt. 用诡计取得；激起...的兴趣 vi. 私通；密谋 同义词:scheme, designing, fraud, plot, conspiracy, plot, collogue to intrigue against one's friends阴谋陷害朋友
vt. 投资；覆盖；耗费；授予；包围 vi. 投资，入股；花钱买 同义词:fund, award, give, house, sheet, invent money in, plow into to invest money in stocks投资股票
n. [地物] 电离层 同义词:ionized layer, F layer Its upper limit is determined by the conditions in the ionosphere .他们主要局限性是不能上升到电离层。
n. 熨斗；烙铁；坚强 vt. 熨；用铁铸成 adj. 铁的；残酷的；刚强的 vi. 熨衣；烫平 同义词:sadiron, flatiron, cruel, ferrous to iron a shirt flat将衬衫熨平整
adv. 讽刺地；说反话地 同义词:satirically, sarcastically Ironically , however , it is time that kills people because eventually everyone must die .然而，反讽的是，杀死人的却是时间，因为每个人终将死亡。
n. 钢铁厂；铁工厂 同义词:forge The Sussex ironworks were carried on at such a prodigious expense of wood .苏塞克斯铁厂象这样办下去使木材造成如此惊人的耗费。
n. 不规则物；不合规格的产品 adj. 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的 同义词:abnormal, orrow A sort of irregular war was carried on with varied success all over the country .他们在全国各地进行一种非正式的战争，得到了不同程度的成功。
n. 不规则；无规律；不整齐 同义词:anomaly, abnormity There irregularity in your application .你的申请书不齐全。
adj. 不可抵抗的；不能压制的；极为诱人的 同义词:knock-down By an irresistible association of ideas, he went beyond logic and reason .不由自主的联想竟把他引向逻辑和理性以外去了。

adj. 巡回的；流动的 n. 巡回者；行商 同义词:floating, fluid, flowing, road, running, circuiter, pedlery Aiqing , 44 years old , and Aijun , 40 years old , had each spent more than six years as itinerant miners .44岁的唐爱青与40岁的唐爱军，均有六年以上出外当矿工的经历。

n. 罐；广口瓶；震动；刺耳声 vi. 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声 vt. 震动；刺激；使震动 同义词:pot, shock, collide with, conflict with, stimulate, fan, shock People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。
adj. 抽筋的；急动的；不平稳的 n. 牛肉干 This is the classic cry of someone who 's doing jerky tango .这是典型的正在进行着”喜怒无常探戈“的人说出的话。
n. 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉 adj. 墨黑的 vt. 射出 vi. 射出；[航] 乘喷气式飞机 同义词:emission, ejection nozzle, coal-black, jet-black, shoot out, send up, shoot out, send up Water was jetting profusely from the pipe.水从管子里汩汩喷出。

n. 关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉 adj. 共同的；连接的；联合的，合办的 vt. 连接，贴合；接合；使有接头 vi. 贴合；生节 同义词:seam, junction, mutual, corporate, common, linked, connected, cement, piece, couple Align mark on front joint , or CV joint , to the mark on the axle pinion yoke , or flange .将前万向节或cv万向节上的标志与车轴小齿轮轴轭或凸缘上的标志对准。
n. （水果）汁，液；果汁 同义词:extract, syrup Mother is juicing some grapes.母亲正在榨葡萄汁。
n. [天] 木星；朱庇特（罗马神话中的宙斯神） The nine major planets are Mercury , Venus , Earth , Mars , Jupiter , Saturn , Uranus , Neptune and Pluto .九大行星分别是水星、金星、地球、火星、木星、土星、天王星、海王星和冥王星。
adv. 无可非议地；言之有理地 同义词:unquestionably "Huh? Break a sale ?", you might justifiably ask .“呃，销售失败？”，你可能会言之有理地问。
n. 理由；辩护；认为有理，认为正当；释罪 同义词:reason, excuse, sake, account, occasion There is no justification for his rude behaviour .他粗暴无礼的行为是毫无道理的。

adv. 公正地；正当地；恰当地；正直地 同义词:properly, happily, right, honestly Mr Bush justly chided for backing anti- AIDS programmes that advocate only sexual abstinence , an approach that seldom works .布什先生的批评者认为，他支持的抗艾计划只鼓励性节制这样一个很难有效果的方法。
adj. 青少年的；幼稚的 n. 青少年；少年读物 同义词:tender, teen-age, youths, teener What a waste for a frog to lay so many thousands of eggs for just a couple of juvenile offspring !青蛙一次产出成千上万只卵，只为了少数几个子代成蛙，这是多么大的浪费！
adj. 敏锐的，敏捷的；渴望的；强烈的；热心的；锐利的 n. 痛哭，挽歌 同义词:acute, intense, eager, pointed, burning, elegy, dirge to keen a knife磨快刀子
vt. 保持；经营；遵守；饲养 vi. 保持；继续不断 n. 保持；生计；生活费 同义词:retain, operate, run, respect, work, remain, to hold, conservation, maintenance, livelihood May I keep the book?我可以留下这本书吗?
n. （打字机等的）键；关键；钥匙 vt. 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索 vi. 使用钥匙 adj. 关键的 同义词:digital, crux, lock, keyboard, pivotal to key an instrument调整乐器的音调
vt. 踢；反冲，朝后座 n. 踢；反冲，后座力 vi. 踢；反冲 同义词:boot, back flushing, backflushing, bounce-back, back flushing The little girl was crying and kicking.那个小女孩一边哭 一边乱踢着。
n. [解剖] 肾脏；腰子；个性 同义词:personality, individuality These include skin disorders like ** eczema , and problems such as kidney failure or liver disease .这包括皮肤骚乱，例如湿疹，和其它如肾衰退、肝脏疾病等问题。

some kind of [美国口语]不错的，很好的；很有效的 something of the kind 类似的事情 I am a good Chinese woman who soft , honest , kinding .我是一个温柔，真诚，善良的中国女人。
n. 膝盖，膝 vt. 用膝盖碰 同义词:lap, genu Holding a baby in her arms, she had to knee the door open.她手里抱着孩子，于是不得不用膝盖将门撞开。
n. 骑士，武士；爵士 vt. 授以爵位 同义词:chevalier, Cavs And finally Christopher Nolan , who did The Dark Knight .最后是克里斯托弗·诺兰，执导了黑骑士。
vt. 知道；认识；懂得 vi. 了解；熟悉；确信 同义词:weet, be aware of, wise, understand, make sure, learn about Does he know English?他懂英语吗?
n. 女士，夫人；小姐；妻子 同义词:Miss, Mrs, wife, madam A young lady feels her face is dry .一位年轻的女士觉得脸部发干。
adj. 大规模的，大范围的；大比例尺的 同义词:wholesale, mass But the details large-scale patterns in biology — are more divisive .但各种详细的解释——你如何用基本的进化原理解释生物学中各种大尺度的格局——更是争议连连。
adv. 主要地；大部分；大量地 同义词:mainly, basically, mostly, primarily, freely I use the Web largely to communicate information about the organization .我大量地使用网络技术来交流有关组织的信息。
n. 云雀；百灵鸟；欢乐 vi. 骑马玩乐；嬉耍 vt. 愚弄 同义词:joy, festival, befool, assify Stop larking about and get down to the problem.别闹了，开始解决这个问题吧。
vt. 鞭打；冲击；摆动；扎捆；煽动；讽刺 vi. 鞭打；猛击；急速甩动 n. 鞭打；睫毛；鞭子；责骂；讽刺 同义词:fan, hide, egg, strike, drive, belt, hit, flogging The racer lashed the horse across the back with a whip.赛马手用鞭子抽打着马背。
adj. 拉丁语的；拉丁人的 n. 拉丁语；拉丁人 That is good news for Latin America , and especially for its poor .对拉丁美洲来说这是个好消息，尤其是对那里的穷人。
n. 纬度；界限；活动范围 同义词:bourn, circumscription Individual American politicians have great latitude to propose new laws .美国政治家们个人在提议新法律方面有非常大的自由度。
adj. 值得赞赏的 Yet , although the ends laudable , her means are questionable .然而，尽管目的值得称道，她的方法却是令人置疑的。

vt. 发射（导弹、火箭等）；发起，发动；使…下水 vi. 开始；下水；起飞 n. 发射；发行，投放市场；下水；汽艇 同义词:release, send, project, drive, let go, proceed, start in, emission, shot, sending, projection, loose In 1970,China successfully lauched a man-made satellite.1970年，中国成功地发射了一颗人造卫星。
n. 洗衣店，洗衣房；要洗的衣服；洗熨；洗好的衣服 同义词:cleaners, loundry Today was a good day for laundry .表示说，今天是洗衣服的好日子。
n. 敷设；布置；产卵数；瞄准 v. 放置；产卵（lay的ing形式） 同义词:arrangement, positioning, setting, aiming, training, setting, putting, positioning They underlaid the Atlantic with a cable.他们在大西洋海底铺设了一条电缆。
n. 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字 同义词:explanation, notes, romance, illustration Over the centuries the truth about the King has become blurred by his legend .几个世纪过去了，有关这位国王的真相已被其传奇所模糊。
adv. 明了地；易读地 Please legibly .请用正楷填写此表。
n. （古罗马）军团；众多；军队 adj. 众多的；大量的 同义词:force, mass, battalion, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, vast He 'll address the American Legion Convention in Salt Lake City .他将在盐湖城美国退伍军人大会上发表演讲。
n. 美国退伍军人协会会员；军团的士兵 The angular shifting camo pattern of the SPI armor was one part legionnaire mail, one part tactical body armor , and one part chameleon .SPI盔甲那个有棱角的变化伪装图案是军用铠甲的一部分，一部分是战术体甲，一部变色。
n. 列宁格勒（前苏联西北部港市） Army Group North was driving up along the Baltic toward Leningrad .北方军团，沿着波罗的海向列宁格勒挺进。
vt. 使…变小；使…减轻；使…变少 vi. 减少；减轻；变小 同义词:to cut down, fall off to lessen production costs降低生产成本
n. 救生 adj. 就生的 We will expand life- saving anti - retroviral drugs .我们将扩大救命的逆转录酶药物的供给。
vi. 减轻；发亮 vt. 使照亮；使轻松 同义词:lamp, to alleviate, rest Several candles lightened the darkness of the basement.几支蜡烛照亮了黑暗的地下室。
adv. 轻轻地；轻松地；容易地；不费力地 同义词:easily, gently, easy, readily He would spring onto the terrace , lift the steak lightly off the fire .他就纵身跳上地坪，轻轻地把牛排从火上取下来。
adj. 闪电的；快速的 n. 闪电 vi. 闪电 同义词:fast, sudden, levin, bolt It lightninged just as we walked out of the building.就在我们走出大楼时打起闪来了。
n. 可能性，可能 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, potential, maybe In all likelihood he would encounter no one here .十有八九，在这里也不会遇见熟人的。
n. 亚麻布，亚麻线；亚麻制品 adj. 亚麻的；亚麻布制的 同义词:flax, flaxen I quite like the linen . How much is one piece ?我很喜欢亚麻的。多少钱一块儿？

n. [计] 链环，环节；联系，关系 vt. 连接，连结；联合，结合 vi. 连接起来；联系在一起；将人或物连接或联系起来 同义词:relationship, connection, bearing, contact, concern, couple, become one They planned to build a highway to link the two towns.他们打算修一条公路将两个城镇连接起来。
vt. 液化；溶解 同义词:solve, resolve Victims die of shock or liver failure within days ; often their insides liquefy .患者会在数日内因休克或肝功能衰竭而死亡，通常他们的内脏还不会凝结。
n. [计] 列表；清单；目录 vi. 列于表上 vt. 列出；记入名单内 同义词:statement, directory, bill, content He listed all the members' names on the card.他把所有会员的名字都记在卡片上。
adv. 照字面地；逐字地 同义词:verbatim A lousy marriage might literally make you sick .糟糕的婚姻真的可以让人生病！
adj. 文学的；书面的；精通文学的 同义词:written By sheer force of personality he managed to infiltrate literary society and had various bits and pieces published .全然凭借个人的彰显的风格，他成功跻身文学界，也有零星的作品得以发表。
n. 蜥蜴；类蜥蜴爬行动物 同义词:cabrite I built a small , mirrored box , and I bought a color - changing lizard and placed it inside .我做了一个内置镜子的小箱子，买了一条会变颜色的蜥蜴放进去。
n. 负载，负荷；工作量；装载量 vi. [力] 加载；装载；装货 vt. 使担负；装填 同义词:charge, working capacity, charge up, chamber a wagonload of coal一车煤

adj. 拖长的；长期的 同义词:chronic, long time, standing, extended Far away out in the marsh there arose, all of a sudden , a sound like the cry of anger , then another on the back of it; and then one horrid , long - drawn scream .远处的沼泽地突然传来了一声愤怒的喊叫，接着又是一声，再后来是一声可怕的、拖长了的惨叫。
n. 渴望，热望；憧憬 adj. 渴望的，极想得到的 v. 渴望（long的ing形式） 同义词:aspiration, eagerness, eager, desired, hungry, anxious, sick, craving, hankering I know what it means to be longing for something .我深深知道对事物的渴望是怎麽回事。
adj. 长度的，纵向的；经线的 同义词:linear, fore-and-aft He also obtained similarity solutions for longitudinal and spherically symmetric motions .他也得出了关于纵向对称运动和球面对称运动的类似解。
n. 了望台；了望员 Our look - out spied a man hiding in some bushes .我们的了望哨发现树丛中藏着人。
n. 织布机；若隐若现的景象 vi. 可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见 vt. 在织布机上织 同义词:weaving machine A flagpole loomed up through the mist.在薄雾中隐隐可见一根旗杆。
n. 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物 vt. 喜欢；热爱；爱慕 vi. 爱 同义词:passion, amativeness, worship, take a fancy to We love our motherland.我们热爱祖国。
adj. 低级的；品质低劣的 同义词:lowclass, lowlevel " We have a low-grade fever of trade tensions and the temperature is starting to rise , " he said .“我们面临一场‘贸易紧张低烧'，而温度正开始上升，”他说。
n. 忠诚；忠心；忠实 同义词:faith, devotion They still show amazing loyalty to their parents .他们仍对父母表现出惊人的忠诚。
vi. 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动 vt. 砍伐木材；乱堆 n. 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声 同义词:log, wood, waste, timber, refuse, garbage The valley was lumbered hard 2 years ago.这个山谷两年前被大肆采伐过。
n. 奢侈，奢华；奢侈品；享受 adj. 奢侈的 同义词:enjoyment, luxe, extravagant, Lucullian The business concept behind the Hoxton is described as " luxury budget".霍克顿背后的商业概念可以形容为“廉价豪华”。
vt. 使疯狂；激怒 vi. 发狂 同义词:anger, provoke, go ape, go bananas He was maddened by the pain and jumped out of the window.痛苦把他折磨得发狂，他从窗子跳了出去。
adj. 魔术的；有魔力的 同义词:demonic The effect of the treatment upon the patient was magical .这种治疗对于病人的效果是意想不到的。
n. 大小；量级；[地震] 震级；重要；光度 同义词:dimensions, moment, size, importance For an explanation see Magnitude .相关解释请参见震级。
n. 鹊，喜鹊；饶舌的人；有收集零碎东西癖好的人 adj. 鹊的；有收集癖的；斑驳的，混杂的 同义词:chatterer, flibbertigibbet, miscellaneous, pied The moon magpie , wind , not in packaging .月亮的喜鹊，风，而不是在包装。
n. 象夫；管象人 " What 's the meaning of this ?" he shouted to the mahout .“这是什么意思呀？”他大声问了问那个看象人。
adj. 未婚的，处女的；初次的 n. 少女；处女 同义词:unwed, virgin, damoiselle, jill One day he ordered his son Hephaestus to build an image of a beautiful maiden out of clay .一天，他命令他的儿子赫菲斯托斯用粘土塑造了一个美丽的少女。
n. 维护，维修；保持；生活费用 同义词:conservation, keep Instead maintenance will be possible only in good weather .但天气好的条件下维修将成为可能。
n. （法）总管，管家 同义词:main pipe, seneschal So if your maitre d' friend has any funny Oklahoma jokes …如果你的领班朋友有任何好笑的奥克拉荷马笑话…

adj. 庄严的；宏伟的 同义词:grand, magnificent, solemn, sacred, noble With the night , St . Peter 's stood out in darkness , stood out in majestic profile against the splendour of heaven .接着夜晚来临，圣彼得教堂耸立在黑暗中，以雄伟的轮廓陪衬天国的光辉。
n. 多数；成年 同义词:plurality, multitude The majority of his colleagues wished to utilize " our time " to rearm as rapidly as possible.他的多数同僚希望利用这个“我们的时代”来尽快地重新武装起来。

n. 长毛象；猛犸象；庞然大物 adj. 巨大的，庞大的；猛犸似的 同义词:monolith, leviathan, huge, enormous, tremendous, massive, macro The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of a huge Columbian mammoth .最震撼的发现是几乎完整的一具大型哥伦比亚猛犸的骨架。
n. 杀人的人；可致命的东西；荡妇 同义词:slut, chippie I love that red man - killer skirt of yours .我喜欢你那条使男人神魂颠倒的红短裙。
adj. 易管理的；易控制的；易办的 The secret, as with any computing task , is to break the problem into smaller , manageable chunks .正如任何计算任务，关键是把问题分解成更小、更易管理的“块”。

vt. 证明，表明；显示 vi. 显示，出现 n. 载货单，货单；旅客名单 adj. 显然的，明显的；明白的 同义词:indicate, prove, demonstrate, reveal, make clear, occur, make clear, figure, offer, come out, passenger list, apparent, obvious, distinct, transparent, decided They manifested much willingness to go.他们表示很愿意去。
n. [机] 操纵器，调制器；操作者 同义词:keyer, modulator Will the Treasury call China a currency manipulator ?财政部会将中国定义为“货币操纵国”吗？
vi. 调动；演习；用策略 vt. 诱使；操纵；耍花招 n. 策略（等于maneuvre） 同义词:set in motion, dry run, man, guide, strategy, device, game plan The admiral manoeuvred his ships in the battle plan.舰队司令按作战计划进行舰队演习。
adj. 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的 n. 海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官 同义词:nautical, sea-born, shipping industry, bluejacket European scientists are trying to find ways of farming more marine fish .欧洲科学家正在尝试找到养殖更多的海洋鱼群的方法。
n. 水手；船员 同义词:sailor, Jacky The figure of the Ancient Mariner has been variously interpreted .对于《古舟子咏》中的人物，一直有着各种各样的理解。
n. 标志；马克；符号；痕迹 vi. 作记号 vt. 标志；做标记于；打分数 同义词:symbol, sign, seal, flag, trace, signal The hot cups have marked the table badly.这些热杯子把桌面都烫坏了。
adj. 显著的；有记号的 v. 表示（mark的过去分词）；作记号；打分数 同义词:obvious, prominent, noted, outstanding, telling Second , there is a marked change in the public mood since 1995 .第二，自1995年以来，公众的情绪有了很显著的变化。
n. 元帅；司仪 vt. 整理；引领；编列 vi. 排列 同义词:officiator, arrange, sort things out, arrange, form He marshaled his facts well.他把事实列举得很好。
n. 面具；口罩；掩饰 vi. 掩饰；戴面具；化装 vt. 掩饰；戴面具；使模糊 同义词:blind, face-piece, dissimulate, make sb up, belie, disguise The bank robbers masked their faces.抢劫银行的强盗脸上戴着面具。

n. 块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多 adj. 群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的 vi. 聚集起来，聚集 vt. 使集合 同义词:piece, block, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, concentrated, intensive, wholesale, concentrate, collect, crowd Crowds massed along the road where the film star would pass.人群聚集在电影明星要经过的街道旁。
adj. 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的 同义词:huge, extensive, macro, substantial, tremendous, enormous It is a massive issue .这是一个巨大的问题。
n. 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义 As for capitalism 's wasteful materialism , even Adam Smith had a problem with it .就资本主义浪费的物质主义来说，即使亚当。斯密也颇有微辞。
adj. 实事求是的；讲求实际的；不带感情的；平淡的 同义词:dispassionate, literal-minded The news sounded major to me , but he delivered it in a calm , matter - of - fact tone.这消息对我来说是件大事，然而父亲却说的很平静，很客观。

n. 马特洪峰（阿尔卑斯山峰之一，位于瑞士与意大利之间的边境） There is no doubt that the Alps Matterhorn is definitely the most well-known and most impressive of a mountain , known as the " king of the mountains ."毫无疑问，马特宏峰绝对是阿尔卑斯山脉中最知名且最让人印象深刻的一座山，号称“群山之王”。
n. [数] 极大，最大限度；最大量 adj. 最高的；最多的；最大极限的 同义词:ceiling amount, highest, supreme, peak, top, most The pursuit of maximum profit seems destined to prevail .追逐利润最大化似乎注定将会盛行。
adj. 平均的；卑鄙的；低劣的 vt. 意味；想要；意欲 n. 平均值 vi. 用意 同义词:poor, average, base, dirty, feel like, wanna, desire, imply, intend, general average, medium value She never meant anything of the sort.她决没有那种意思。
n. 手段；方法；财产（mean的复数） v. 意思是；打算（mean的第三人称单数） 同义词:ways, methods, techniques, modes, assets, purposes The thin atmosphere means Mars gets very cold .大气层稀薄意味着火星十分寒冷。
n. 测量；措施；程度；尺寸 vt. 测量；估量；权衡 vi. 测量；估量 同义词:extent, degree, survey, dimension, size, sound, scale, estimate, take stock of, weigh up to measure the cliff测量悬崖的高度
n. 测量；[计量] 度量；尺寸；量度制 同义词:survey, dimension, size Displacement is measurement of the actual changing location of the ground due to shaking .地震位移是用来表示由于震动所产生的地壳实际位置变化。
adj. 机械的；力学的；呆板的；无意识的；手工操作的 同义词:wooden, automatic, dead A soul has to be found in a mechanical act , the soulless labor of operating a camera.我们必须在机械的行为和没有灵魂的照相机操作过程中找到灵魂。
n. 机械化；机动化 同义词:motorisation to mechanize an industrial process使工业程序机械化
adj. 中世纪的；中古的 The pictures there were all about mediaeval art .画廊里的画都是关于中古时期艺术。
adj. 中间的，中等的；半生熟的 n. 方法；媒体；媒介；中间物 同义词:mid, intermediary, middle, secondary, moderate, method, approach, way, system, how A medium coffee of the day , please .请给我一杯中杯的本日咖啡。

vt. 满足；遇见；对付 vi. 相遇；接触 n. 集会 adj. 合适的；适宜的 同义词:fulfill, fill, front, come in contact with, to be in touch with, assembly, gathering, congregation, becoming, shaped, applicable, likely, possible I met an old school friend today.今天我遇到了一位老校友。
n. [物][计量] 兆周（等于megahertz） Hightower: We did two global routes in one megacycle !我们在一兆周内造了两条环球线路！
n. 威胁；恐吓 vi. 恐吓；进行威胁 vt. 威胁；恐吓 同义词:threat, danger, to threaten, cow, to threaten The purpose of all the menace , most people think , is to intimidate the opposition .多数人认为，这些威慑无非就是为了恐吓反对派。
adj. 仁慈的；慈悲的；宽容的 同义词:kind, humane How can a merciful God permit a human being to suffer such torment ?仁慈的上帝怎么容许一个人受这样的痛苦？
n. 水银；水银柱；精神 同义词:energy, spirit, soul, mind, genius Parachutes lowered the Mercury spacecraft to the ocean surface .降落伞将“水星”号航天器降落到海面。
vt. 合并；使合并；吞没 vi. 合并；融合 同义词:conflate, incorporate with, incorporate with, coalesce We can merge our two small businesses into a larger one.我们可以把我们的两家小商店合并为一家大商行。
n. 美人鱼（传说中的）；女子游泳健将 同义词:sea-maiden The little mermaid sang a song .小美人鱼唱了一首歌。
n. 报信者，送信者；先驱 同义词:precursor, forerunner And tell messenger that he or she must be explicit .另外还要告诉那位代言人，必须直截了当。
n. 老鼠（mouse的复数） to mouse out a neighborhood scandal窥探出邻居的丑行

n. 力量；威力；势力 v. 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该 aux. 可能；也许 同义词:strength, force, muscle, power, influence, should You might think you're clever, but that doesn't give you the right to order her about!你也许认为自己很聪明，但你没有权力向她发号施令!

n. 候鸟；移居者；随季节迁移的民工 adj. 移居的；流浪的 同义词:visitor, migratory bird, ragamuffinly, nomadic Most of the migrant workers in the Gulf states hail from Asia , but a lot are also sucked in from the poorer Arab countries .墨西哥湾沿岸各国的大部分移民工人来自亚洲，但许多人却进入了更为贫困的阿拉伯国家。
n. 迁移；移民；移动 同义词:removal, move, shift, motion, transplantation We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
adj. 温和的；轻微的；淡味的；文雅的；不含有害物质的的 n. （英国的一种）淡味麦芽啤酒 同义词:pacific, gentle, moderate, soft, slight " Mild indifference " probably sums up best her colleagues ' attitudes to Louise .“适度的冷淡”大概最能概括她同事对路易斯的态度。
adj. 乳白色的；牛奶的；乳状的；柔和的；混浊不清的 同义词:female, delicate A few , however , are real whoppers— the products of events far more powerful than occur in the Milky Way.然而，它们中有少数的确是不容忽视的，星体的产物远比银河系里的更有力量。
vi. 乱转；被碾磨 n. 工厂；磨坊；磨粉机；制造厂；压榨机 vt. 搅拌；碾磨；磨细；使乱转 同义词:factory, plant, work, mix round, churn up to mill grain碾碎谷物
n. 千年期，千禧年；一千年，千年纪念；太平盛世，黄金时代 同义词:chiliad, Golden Age It 's important to remind people to be hopeful and not fear millennium .更要紧的是，这可以让人们怀抱希望，而不是害怕千禧新年的到来。
vt. 模仿，摹拟 n. 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑 adj. 模仿的，模拟的；假装的 同义词:simulate, pattern, imitate, aper, imitator, affected, simulate, assumed He made us all laugh by mimicking the teacher's voice.他模仿老师的声音，逗得我们哈哈大笑。
n. 理智，精神；意见；智力；记忆力 vt. 介意；专心于；照料 vi. 介意；注意 同义词:opinion, intelligence, energy, memory, spirit, devote one's attention to, concentrate upon, take care of, take notice Mind their words !记住他们的话!
n. 矿物；（英）矿泉水；无机物；苏打水（常用复数表示） adj. 矿物的；矿质的 同义词:table-water, inorganics The experts at NIH say the wax can be softened by mineral oil , glycerin or eardrops .NIH的专家们说耳蜡可以通过矿物油、甘油或者滴耳剂进行软化。
n. 矿业；采矿 to mine for copper采铜
n. 少数民族；少数派；未成年 adj. 少数的；属于少数派的 同义词:ethnic minorities, nonage The first is whether innovation will spread beyond minority of firms .第一件事是创新是否能在一小撮公司以外扩展开来。
vt. 配制；混淆；使混和；使结交 vi. 参与；相混合；交往 n. 混合；混合物；混乱 同义词:confuse with, participate, travel, company, sort, mixture, hybrid, chaos, disorder, confusion I'm mixing a cake.我在拌和配料做蛋糕。
adj. 机动的；易变的，；非固定的 n. 运动物体 同义词:variable, liquid, motor, unstable In some trains you can't even use your mobile phones !在一些火车上你甚至都不能用你的移动电话！
n. 移动性；机动性；[电子] 迁移率 同义词:maneuverability, manoeuvrability Traditionally , the middle class has supported meritocracy and upward mobility , more than the elite has done.传统上，中产阶级比精英分子更支持精英管理和个人向上流动。

vt. 嘲弄；模仿；使…失望；使…无效 vi. 嘲弄，嘲笑 n. 嘲弄；仿制品；嘲笑对象 adj. 模拟的；假装的；伪造的 adv. 虚伪地 同义词:guy, simulate, pattern, imitate, make game of, jeer at, derisiveness, imitation, affected, false, assumed, simulate, lyingly, falsely She mocked him as a country boy.她嘲笑他是个乡下孩子。
n. 现代性；现代的东西；新式 同义词:stylishness Beyond that , it is a global expression of cultural modernity .除此以外，悉尼歌剧院还是文化现代性的一种全球表述。
adj. 谦虚的，谦逊的；适度的；端庄的；羞怯的 同义词:odest, inobtrusive These measures are a modest step in the right direction .这些措施只不过是正确方向上有限的一小步。
vt. 修改，修饰；更改 vi. 修改 同义词:alter, dizen, alter, touch up The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.工业革命改变了英国社会的整体结构。
n. 重要，契机；瞬间；重要时刻；指定时刻 同义词:importance, breath, second, magnitude, instant But the moment never seemed right .但时机似乎永远都不大对。
adj. 货币的；财政的 同义词:financial, fiscal Do you have more than $ 2000 in monetary instruments ?你有价值超过2000美元货币的东西吗?。
adj. 巨大的；怪异的；荒谬的；畸形的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro Its monstrous wings seem to wheel in the leaden air around me .它那怕人的翅膀仿佛在我周围沉重的空气中旋转。
n. 情绪，语气；心境；气氛 同义词:emotion, atmosphere, tone, spirit, feeling The mood is grief , purpose , unity , and anger under control .悲痛的心情、决心、团结、愤怒都在控制当中。
n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星 vi. 闲荡；出神 vt. 虚度 同义词:satellite, parish lantern, muck about, fool around, dream away, idle Stop mooning about and do something useful for a change!别闲逛了，改一改，做点有用的事吧!
n. 道德；品行，美德 同义词:virtue, excellence Distance is representative of " others " which means morality .距离便是“他人”，而“他人”即社会公德。
adv. 道德上；有道德地；确实地 同义词:strictly, undoubtedly, real Judging people as individuals rather than as representatives of groups is morally right and good for business .将人们作为个体而不是群体的代表来评判，是合情合理的，也是有利于商业的。
adv. 而且；此外 同义词:besides, again, also, then, additionally Moreover , it is in the nature of innovation to feed upon itself .更值得一提的是，创新的本质便是由创新激发创新。
n. 摩洛哥（非洲一国家名）；摩洛哥皮革 The Pentagon says five others went to Afghanistan and one to Morocco .美国国防部说，另外五人去了阿富汗，还有一人去了摩洛哥。
n. 蚊子 同义词:skeeter Malaria is caused by a parasite which is passed to humans though mosquito bites .疟疾是通过蚊虫叮咬后传入人体内的寄生虫引发的一种疾病。
n. 动作；移动；手势；请求；意向 vi. 运动；打手势 vt. 运动；向…打手势 同义词:removal, intention, move, shift, asking, do sport, do morning exercise, do sport, do morning exercise She motioned to the waiter.她向侍者招手。
n. 动机；积极性；推动 同义词:incentive, reason, boost What is your motivation ?你的动力是什么？
vt. 增加；爬上；使骑上马 vi. 爬；上升 n. 山峰；底座；乘骑用马 同义词:enhance, boost, jack, hot, gain, climb, arise, raise, go up, peak, foundation plate to mount the mountain登上山
n. 山；山脉 同义词:range, cordillera More than 600 such tombs are hidden in mountain near Kunming .在昆明的一座山上，隐藏着600多冢这样的坟墓。
adj. 糊涂的；昏庸的 同义词:confused, fatuous If you come across a muddle -headed girl , it may be her .你要是遇见一个糊涂的姑娘，那可能就是她。
vt. 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘 vi. 乘；繁殖；增加 adv. 多样地；复合地 adj. 多层的；多样的 同义词:ride, breed, improve, accelerate, gain, diversiform, variant to multiply 9 by 4 .以4乘9。
n. 市民；市政当局；自治市或区 同义词:citizen, corporation The detained boy comes from a broken family in southwest China's Chongqing Municipality .这名被扣留的男孩来自我国西南的重庆自治区的一个破裂的家庭。
n. 肌肉；力量 vt. 加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出 vi. 使劲行进 同义词:strength, force, might, power, beef, enhance, cement, build up We muscled our way out.我们使劲挤了出去。
n. 蘑菇，伞菌；蘑菇形物体；暴发户 adj. 蘑菇的；蘑菇形的；迅速生长的 vi. 迅速增加；采蘑菇；迅速生长 同义词:agaric, toadstool, rocket We go mushrooming every morning.我们每天早上去采蘑菇。
n. 枪口，炮口；口套，口络；动物的鼻口 vt. 使…缄默；给…戴口套；封锁…的言论 同义词:gunpoint You should muzzle your dog.你应该给狗戴上口套。

adj. 无数的；种种的 n. 无数，极大数量；无数的人或物 同义词:thousand, countless, million, infinite, innumerable, million, innumerability With luck , it will also replace the myriad other duties and surcharges that pluck the fruits of Indian commerce .如果运气好的话，它还将替换其他抢夺印度商业果实的众多关税和附加费。

n. 神秘的事物；难以理解的事；古代的秘密宗教仪式（mystery的复数） Too many mysteries of the deep remain unexplained and , anyway , no country turns down a chance to enlarge its sovereignty .太多深海的秘密依然未被揭示，而且，不管怎样，没有一个国家会放弃扩张主权的机会。
adj. 神秘的；神秘主义的 n. 神秘主义者 同义词:arcane, uncanny Kelley was a notorious forger , mystic and alchemist who was familiar with Cardan grilles .凯利是个恶名昭彰的伪造者、神秘主义者和鍊金术士，相当熟悉卡丹格板。
n. 神话；虚构的人，虚构的事 同义词:fairy story, fairy tales But he also was a control freak and an artist who built his own myth .但同时透纳也是一个控制欲极强的艺术家，喜欢自己创造自己的神话。
n. 神话；神话学；神话集 同义词:fairy story, fairy tales History , Poetry , Mythology !历史、诗歌、神话！
n. 多发粘液瘤病；[肿瘤] 粘液瘤变性 French physician decided to get rid of the wild rabbits on his own estate and introduced myxomatosis .一个法国内科医生为了摆脱自己的住宅区的兔子而给兔子引入了多发性粘液瘤。

adv. 也就是；即是；换句话说 同义词:viz., i.e. Keynes 's essay explored something his modern disciples often ignore , namely what would happen when "the economic problem " was solved .凯恩斯的信徒们常常会忽视他在短文中探究的问题：即“经济问题”解决后，会发生些什么？
n. 狭小，狭窄；小气 同义词:straitness, stenosis You all should rise above the clouds of ignorance , narrowness , and selfishness .我们都应该起立，盖过那些愚昧、狭隘和自私的黑云。
n. 自然主义者；博物学者；（英）动物标本剥制者；买卖玩赏动物的商人 adj. 自然的（等于naturalistic）；自然主义的；博物学的 同义词:taxidermist, spontaneous, unrestrained The naturalist could tackle the city poor .自然主义者可以写城里的穷人。
n. 自然；性质；本性；种类 同义词:property, category, variety, manner, kind It uses animals to explore human nature .它们用动物来探究人类的本性。
adj. 可航行的；可驾驶的；适于航行的 同义词:floatable, flyable Many of these new plants were located on navigable rivers .这些新工厂大多都座落在通航河流的沿岸。
n. 航行；航海 同义词:salling, siling Naval officers must understand both the theory and the practice of navigation .海军军官必须了解航海术的理论与实践。
n. 海军 同义词:seapower He enjoyed a counter- Carter moment when navy commandos rescued an American hostage , leaving three kidnappers dead.海军突击队营救一名美国人质并击毙三名绑匪，奥巴马享受着反卡特时刻。
n. 星云 Planetary nebulae are not as airy and tranquil as their images suggest.行星状星云并不如影像中所显现的那麽飘逸宁静。
n. 需要；必然性；必需品 同义词:need, want, demand, requirement for They have to do this test necessity .他们出于需要不得不做这项试验。
adj. 贫困的；贫穷的；生活艰苦的 同义词:poor, indigent Needy and handicapped people depend on government relief for their support .穷人和残疾人依靠政府的救济维持生计。
vt. 疏忽，忽视；忽略 n. 疏忽，忽视；怠慢 同义词:ignore, be forgetful of, omission, oversight His genius was neglected for several years.他的创造能力被忽视了好几年。
adj. 邻近的；附近的；接壤的 同义词:adjacent, surrounding Two countries are neighbouring if their boundaries have an edge in common .如果两个国家的边界有公共边，则说它们是相邻的。
n. 裙带关系；起用亲戚 同义词:networking through petticoat influence Corruption and nepotism are pervasive .贪污腐败及任人唯亲之风盛行。
n. [计] 嵌套；造巢；镶嵌 v. 为…筑巢；整天呆在家里；使套入（nest的ing形式） 同义词:snest, crustification He nested himself near his field.他在地边搭了个窝篷。
n. 网络；广播网；网状物 同义词:net, meshwork His business lunches were taken up with networking.他的交际午餐被用来建立与客户的交流。
adj. 毒害神经的 The makers of the nerve poison include the mambas and the cobras and their venom is called neurotoxic .窄头眼镜蛇和眼镜蛇产生的毒液作用于神经，叫敞神经性毒液；
adj. 不停的；无限的 同义词:huge, infinite, ceaseless The local seafood is therefore clean , plentiful , and never- ending .当地的海鲜因而干净、富饶而且取之不绝。
n. 报纸 同义词:paper, courant Test this the next time you read a newspaper .你下次读报纸的时候可以做下试验。
n. 九柱球戏的木柱 Another Tozeuma shrimp is also found at Ninepin Group.另一款锯片虾也被发现于果洲群岛。
abbr. 网络运行与管理讨论会（Network Operations and Management Symposium） Noms set up a corporate alliance in 2005 that now has more than 100 member companies .该局于2005年创办了一个企业联盟，如今已有100多家会员公司。
adj. 不存在的 同义词:inexistent, beingless The biggest single hurdle for many start - ups is the proprietor 's low or non -existent income in the early years .许多初创企业面临的一个最大障碍是，在经营初期，经营者收入很低或者没有收入。

n. 胡说；废话 adj. 荒谬的 int. 胡说！ 同义词:bullshit, kibosh, ridiculous, preposterous Nonsense , Master Winde ! With Grievous still alive , their ability to wage war has never been stronger .胡说，云度大师！格里菲斯还活着，而他们发动战争的能力从来没有增强。
n. 信纸；便条纸；笔记用纸 同义词:stationery, letter pad We have run out of notepaper .我们已用完了有抬头的信纸。
n. 信息板， 通知栏 So he built a high wall all round it , and put up a notice -board .因此，他建立了一个全面高墙它，并且提出了一系列公告板。
adv. 现今；时下 n. 当今 同义词:today, contemporarily Nowadays , safety and healthiness is most important for us .如今，安全与健康对于我们是最重要的。

adj. 原子能的；[细胞] 细胞核的；中心的；原子核的 同义词:central, atomic The problem is not the great powers with nuclear stockpiles , they say , but rogue regimes such as North Korea and Iran .他们说，问题不在于那些拥有核储备的大国，而在像朝鲜和伊朗这样的流氓政权身上。
n. 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题 vi. 采坚果 同义词:nutsert, female screw He 's surely a hard nut , nobody likes approaching him .他确实是一个难对付的人，没有人喜欢接近他。

adj. 客观的；目标的；宾格的 n. 目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格 同义词:impersonal, accusatival, intention, purpose, sake, target, goal Objective To study the relationship between bronchial asthma and tuberculin reaction .目的研究支气管哮喘与结核菌素反应之间的关系。
n. 义务；职责；债务 同义词:debt, liability The obligation of cohabitation of spouses is the basis of marital rights .夫妻间的同居义务是夫妻其他权利与义务的基础。
n. 观察；监视；观察报告 同义词:view, monitoring, surveillance, watch The careful observation and inference was his daily work .他的日常工作便是仔细的观察和诊断。
n. 障碍；阻碍；妨碍 同义词:intervention, prevention, let, bar, dam Obstruction or occlusion of a blood vessel by an embolus .栓塞血管中由栓子形成的障碍或闭塞。
adj. 能得到的 同义词:getable, gettable The methods of powder metallurgy make it possible to secure compositions and properties not otherwise obtainable .用粉末冶金法可取得用别的方法得不到的成分和性能。

n. 职业；占有；消遣；占有期 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, pursuit, entertainment The happiness and satisfaction we can get from occupation and work are much more than most of us expect .职业和工作在使人得到幸福与满足方面所起的作用比我们大多数意识到的要多得多。
n. 海洋水族馆 同义词:Marine Aquarium In another game , as the turtle swims across the oceanarium .在另一场游戏中，当海龟游过水族馆时。
n. 几率；胜算；不平等；差别 同义词:distinction, differential, contrast At room temperature , the odds of that happening are once in a billion years .在室温条件下，发生那种情况的机会十亿年内只有一次。
n. 气味；声誉 同义词:smell, wind, odor, prestige At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic .吃饭的时候，德国泡菜的气味和大蒜的气味互相竟争着。
n. 犯罪；违反；过错；攻击 同义词:crime, attempt, attack, violation, guilt Then other neighbours , most of them newcomers , took offence at his horses roaming on their properties.随后其他邻居，大部分是新搬来的，攻击他的进入他们地里的马。
adj. 攻击的；冒犯的；无礼的；讨厌的 n. 攻势；攻击 同义词:evil, rank, attack, attempt, push The Syria 's president called Israel 's offensive " a war crime ".叙利亚总统称以色列的进攻是一次战争犯罪。
n. 预兆；征兆 vt. 预示；有…的前兆；预告 同义词:warning, symptom, indicate, forecast, shadow, announce I took it as a good omen .我把这事看作是个好兆头。
adj. 预兆的；不吉利的 同义词:ill, premonitory The onset of dyspnea in heart disease usually signifies ominous prognosis .心脏病患者出现呼吸困难通常提示预后不良。
adj. 露天的；户外的，野外的 同义词:outdoor, weather But Mr Caruso has brought the open-air mall to a pitch of ersatz perfection .但卡鲁索已使露天购物商城的功能发挥到了人工的尽善尽美的程度。
n. 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算 同义词:work, manipulation After working with Operation Smile for a while .在“微笑行动”工作了一段时间后。
n. 反对；反对派；在野党；敌对 同义词:recusation, objection to sth To pass the needed reforms , he may need to appeal to opposition .为通过必需的改革法案，卢拉可能需要向反对党求助。
vt. 压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重 同义词:lie on to oppress opinions压制舆论
n. 乐观；乐观主义 Optimism is an intellectual choice .乐观是一个明智的选择。
n. 折磨；严酷的考验；痛苦的经验 同义词:illusage, torture Only about 10 of the 31 kids in his class lived through the ordeal .他班里31名同学最后只有大约10人逃生，其中包括他救出的两个同学。
n. 命令；顺序；规则；[贸易] 定单 vt. 命令；整理；定购 vi. 命令；定货 同义词:instruction, bidding, telling, regulation, word, require, command, arrange, command I have ordered for you.我已为你点好菜了。
n. 军火；大炮；军械署 同义词:Cannons, ammo The word " grain " is an old ordnance term for explosive powder or even for blocks of cast powders or crystals .药柱这个词是用于炸药或者甚至用于浇注火药块或晶体块的一个古老的军械术语。
n. [生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音 同义词:machinery, apparatus, voice, house The morning after my fourth trip to her house, Miss Caroline played the organ again in church .我第四次给她送花后的第二天早晨，卡洛琳小姐又到教堂里弹管风琴了。

adj. [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的 同义词:fundamental, ultimate, radical, underlying An industry imitating this and other organic principles would be more compatible with the organic domain around it.工业效法这条以及其他的自然原理，就更能与其周边的有机领域相兼容。
n. 有机体；生物体；微生物 同义词:living being, biosome My boss is a single-celled organism .我的老板是一位单细胞生物。
n. 组织；机构；体制；团体 同义词:fabric, machinery, system, community, body Next Monday is World Health Day, observed by the World Health Organization .下个星期一是由世界卫生组织发起的世界健康日。
n. 狂欢；放荡 同义词:revelry, whoop-de-do But in the past four decades orgy of overfishing has reduced its population by more than 80%.但在过去四十年中，过度捕捉已经让金枪鱼的数量锐减了80%以上。
n. 起源；原点；出身；开端 同义词:birth, extraction, dawn But naturally , the Origin of Species was seen as a book written against religion .但是，“物种起源”这本书很自然地被看作是一本反对宗教的书。
n. 原件；原作；原物；原型 adj. 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的 同义词:archetype, antitype, initial, premier, primitive I have the bicycle now but my sister was the original owner .我现在占有这辆自行车，但是这车原先的所有者是我姐姐。
n. 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品 vt. 装饰，修饰 同义词:decoration, adornment, paint, hang, modify, bedeck to ornament the house with flowers and colour lights用鲜花和彩灯装饰房屋
n. 孤儿院；孤儿身份 The feces , which used to worry orphanage a lot, have been made into delicate paper .如今，这些大象粪被造成精美的“象粪纸”，并成为该国的国礼。
n. 卖弄；虚饰；虚有其表 同义词:hotdogger, frills He ignored the public ostentation of his time , as well as the private misery .他忽视那时代公开的虚饰，就像私人的不幸一样。
n. 门诊病人 Out-Patient Department ( OPD ), Taipei Medical University Hospital .台北医学大学附设医院（门诊）“，”
n. 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者 vt. 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护 同义词:gangster, plug-ugly to outlaw an illegal organization取缔非法组织
vt. 花费 n. [会计] 经费；支出；费用 同义词:invested, cost, spend, expend, expenditure, fee, charge, cost The next - biggest government outlay is interest on the debt .接下来最大一宗政府开支就是国债利息支出。
n. 轮廓；大纲；概要；略图 vt. 概述；略述；描画…轮廓 同义词:profile, program, brief, contour, summarize, sum up Yet a group of historians soon drafted an outline .然而一个历史团体不久就起草了一个大纲。
vt. 比…活得长；比…经久；经受住；渡过…而存在 同义词:weather, last out She outlived her son by many years.她比她儿子还多活了好几年。
n. 展望；观点；景色 vt. 比……好看；用目光压倒 vi. 朝外看 同义词:viewpoint, scenery, perspective, picture, eye She outlooks all her friends.她比她所有的女友都漂亮。
n. 外人；无取胜希望者 同义词:gaijin Already it has taught me , an outsider , that to live as human beings means to live with other life .我一个局外人已经从中接受了教育，像人类一样生活就意味着和其它生命一起生活。
adv. 向外地 Does this door outwards ?这扇门通向花园。
adj. 全部的；全体的；一切在内的 adv. 全部地；总的说来 n. 工装裤；罩衫 同义词:entire, all, corporate, total, universal, outright, jeans, jea Overall , however , it makes the most money .但总体看来，它赚了最多的钱。
n. 过度拥挤；挤满 v. 过度拥挤（overcrowd的ing形式）；把…塞得过满 同义词:cramming But in Belgium the numbers locked up keep rising , causing serious overcrowding .而比利时的罪犯人数却稳步增长，导致了监狱严重人满为患。
vt. 透支；拉过度；夸张 vi. 透支；夸张 同义词:advance by overdraft, put it on, advance by overdraft, put it on It's the first time I had ever overdrawn my account.那是我第一次透支我的账户。
adv. 在头顶上；在空中；在高处 adj. 高架的；在头上的；在头顶上的 n. 天花板；[会计] 经常费用 同义词:aerially, ceiling boarding, current expenses Debits to Factory Overhead come from various sources .制造费用借方数据有几种来源。
n. 人口过剩 The Irish would not allow overpopulation to occur again .爱尔兰人不允许再发生人口过剩。
n. 泛滥成灾；超出限度 vt. 泛滥；超过；蹂躏 vi. 泛滥；蔓延 同义词:better than, top, creep, to spread It was the time when the Japanese aggressors overran China.那是在日本侵略军侵占中国的时期。
adv. 在海外，海外 adj. 海外的，国外的 同义词:beyond the sea, transmarine, off-shore For overseas markets , the process may call for a modified product .在海外市场，这一过程有时要求对产品进行改进。
adv. 压倒性地；不可抵抗地 Again , the evidence overwhelmingly to the contrary .证据再一次不可抗拒地指向反面。
vi. 工作过度 vt. 工作过度 n. 过度工作 He overworked himself on that new job.他做那项新工作太劳累了。
vt. 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于 vi. 欠钱 同义词:appreciate, be grateful to to owe money to the bank欠银行钱
n. 牛津大学；牛津（英国城市） 同义词:University of Oxford In the latest edition of the Oxford .最新版的《牛津英语大词典》中。
n. [化学] 氧气，[化学] 氧 同义词:O2 Mixing and igniting gasoline and oxygen in an engine generates turbulence .在引擎内混合汽油与氧气然后点火，会产生紊流。
n. 一步；步速；步法 vi. 踱步；缓慢而行 vt. 踱步于；用步测 同义词:footwork He paces his yard every morning他每天早晨都在院子里踱来踱去。
adj. 包装过的 v. 包装；把…装袋（package的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:cased, wapped He packaged up the books and put them under his bed after examination.考完试他就把书捆起来，放到床铺底下去了。
adj. （常用来构成复合词）充满…的，塞满了…的 v. 包装（pack的过去分词） 同义词:steeped, fraught We squeezed through the narrow , chattering , jam packed bar to the entrance of the big room.狭窄的酒吧里喧喧嚷嚷，挤得满满的。我们挤过人堆，来到大厅入口处。
adj. 异教的；异教徒的 n. 异教徒；无宗教信仰者 同义词:heretical, heathenish, unbeliever, goy While Easter is a Christian tradition , it is connected to an old pagan holiday .虽然复活节是基督教的一个传统，但却和一个古老的异教节日有关。
adv. 无痛苦地，不费力地 同义词:easy, lightly The needles painlessly puncture the skin , but do not go through it.针头会毫无痛觉地刺进皮肤，但不会刺穿。
n. 降落伞 vi. 跳伞 同义词:chute, to bail out Supplies were dropped by parachute .供应品用降落伞空投。
n. 悖论，反论；似非而是的论点；自相矛盾的人或事 The paradox is that Japan does need serious education reform .矛盾的地方是日本确实需要教育改革。
adj. 矛盾的；诡论的；似非而是的 同义词:contradictory, conflictive Even if time travel isn't strictly paradoxical , it is certainly weird .不过，就算严格说来时光旅行不再矛盾好了，它肯定是很怪异的。
n. 教区居民 The work of this group is to decorate the church environment so that parishioner may perceive the above idea .小组的组员便是负责美化圣堂内的环境，使教友感受到上述的意念。
vi. 分享；参与；分担；带有某种性质 vt. 分担；分享 同义词:mix, participate in, participate in, share in The chance to partake in such a great historic movement doesn't come every day.参加这样一个伟大的、有历史意义的运动的机会真是千载难逢。
n. 颗粒；[物] 质点；极小量；小品词 同义词:grain, granule Coconut powder , Milk , Coconut plant particle , Cane sugar , Sea salt , Soya bean .椰子粉，牛奶，椰子植物颗粒，甘蔗糖，海盐，大豆油。

adj. 特别的；详细的；独有的；挑剔的 n. 详细说明；个别项目 同义词:extraordinary, strict, detailed, special, exclusive, detailed specification, detailed description Deep drilling poses particular problems of high pressure and temperature .深海钻探带来高压力和温度的特殊问题。
n. [鸟] 鹧鸪；松鸡 同义词:francolin, jay The partridge in a pear tree was Jesus Christ .在梨树上的鹌鹑就是耶稣基督。
n. 一段（文章）；走廊；通路 同义词:hall, opening, access, corridor passage to U.S.A.航行到美国
adv. 热情地；强烈地；激昂地 同义词:warmly, intensely This newspaper believes passionately in the principle of free markets .这份报纸对自由市场的原则饱含热情，笃信不疑。
n. 娱乐，消遣 同义词:entertainment, recreation, pleasure, sport, occupation Playing cards is our favorite pastime when travel by train .打牌是我们乘火车旅行时最喜欢的娱乐消遣。
vt. 授予专利；取得…的专利权 adj. 专利的；新奇的；显然的 n. 专利权；执照；专利品 同义词:apparent, novel, transparent, decided, license, permit an invention that is patented一项具有专利权的发明
n. 道路；小路；轨道 同义词:way, railway, track, road, course Failure is the path to success .失败是通往成功的道路。
adj. 可怜的，悲哀的；感伤的；乏味的 同义词:poor, sad, melting, stupid But Mr Carey pulls the pathetic fallacy out of the hat with panache .但是凯里用华丽的辞藻把可怜的假象展现在了眼前。
n. 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神 In the past , proving one's patriotism was the way to win votes , but no longer .过去，赢得选举的关键在于证明自己有多爱国，而现在不是了。
n. 巡逻；巡逻队；侦察队 vt. 巡逻；巡查 vi. 巡逻；巡查 The army regularly patrol along the border.部队按时在边境巡逻。
n. 赞助；光顾；任免权 同义词:sponsorship, auspice He also deeply mistrusts the system of patronage which has proved such a mixed blessing throughout music 's long history .此外他也格外不信任资助的形式，虽然经过长期音乐历史证明，该形式有利有弊。
n. 模式；图案；样品 vt. 模仿；以图案装饰 vi. 形成图案 同义词:mode, device, design, schema, specimen, simulate, imitate He has patterned himself after the example of his father.他一举一动都模仿他父亲的样子。

n. 山峰；最高点；顶点；帽舌 vt. 使达到最高点；使竖起 vi. 消瘦；到达最高点；变憔悴 adj. 最高的；最大值的 同义词:height, sky, summit, mount, crown, cock, slim down, highest, supreme, maximum, top, tallest She pursed her pretty lips and peaked her eyebrows.她紧闭美丽的双唇，竖起眉毛。
n. [园艺] 梨树；梨子 Miss Cat 's pear is green .猫小姐的梨是绿色的。
n. 偷看；隐约看见，瞥见 vi. 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫 vt. 使出现 同义词:peek, occur, figure, offer The birds peeped exactly as we refilled the feeder.当我们再加饲料的时候，小鸟就唧唧喳喳叫个不停。
adj. 刑事的；刑罚的 同义词:criminal, punitive As in private equity , many investors failed to grasp the penal nature of hedge fund charges .正如私募股本一样，多数投资者没能抓住对冲基金收费的罪恶本质。
n. 罚款，罚金；处罚 同义词:fine, amercement The penalty for helping Jews was instant execution .帮助犹太人的面临的处罚是立即处决。
vt. 渗透；穿透；洞察 vi. 渗透；刺入；看透 同义词:filter, permeate, sink, osmose The nail easily penetrated the soft wood.钉子很容易地就穿透了软木材。
n. 笔架 Penholder large wholesale ex-factory price!出厂价笔筒大量批发！
n. 细长三角旗；奖旗；信号旗 同义词:weft, signal flag A thin night -wind sprang up, setting the high flames whipping like a burning pennant .晚风轻拂，拨动着高涨的火焰，如同一展燃烧的旗帜一般，飘拂着。
vt. 察觉，感觉；理解；认知 vi. 感到，感知；认识到 同义词:detect, feel, absorb, see, read, to feel, come to realize The students perceived that his behavior had changed.同学们发觉他的行为有些变化。
n. 知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取 同义词:consciousness, viewpoint, sense, feel, insight Her perception of the right seemed almost intuitive .她对正确事物的理解几乎是直觉的。
adj. 危险的，冒险的 同义词:dangerous, critical, risky, threatening, hazardous It is a new continent , rich in resources but in parts most perilous .它是一块新大陆：资源丰富，但局部地区非常危险。
vt. 迫害；困扰；同…捣乱 同义词:beset, eat at They persecute those who do not conform to their ideas.他们迫害那些不符合他们意见的人。
n. 个性；品格；名人 同义词:being, kidney, lion, individuality Excellent personality is one of the decisive factors in English study .杰出的个性是英语学习的决定因素之一。
adj. 相关的，相干的；中肯的；切题的 同义词:relevant, relational, correlative As a more pertinent example , consider the mass of the sun .还有个更适当的例子，想想看太阳的质量吧。
vt. 遍及；弥漫 同义词:suffuse Weariness pervaded his whole body.他全身疲倦。
n. 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人 同义词:verm, injurious insect Pest control is one of the major areas of concern in intensive agriculture .病虫害防治是集约型农业所关心的主要方面之一。
n. 瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物 同义词:plague, murrain A pestilence overhangs the country .瘟疫威胁着那国家。
n. （英）汽油 同义词:gasoline, gas The overall labour market is tight , wages are up and petrol prices have fallen .总体的劳动力市场依然是紧缺的，工资在上升，油价在下跌。
n. 现象；奇迹；杰出的人才 同义词:wonder, miracle This is a more complex phenomenon than the " quiet coup " Prof Johnson describes .这种现象比约翰逊教授所描述的“无声的政变”更为复杂。

adj. 哲学的（等于philosophic）；冷静的 同义词:cool, imperturbable When adopting open source , institutions should ensure it is a strategic decision and not just a philosophical one.采用开源时，各家机构应该确保这是一个战略上的决策，而不只是一个哲学上的决策。
vt. 为…拍照；使深深印入 vi. 拍照；在照片上显得 n. 照片，相片 同义词:take a photo, to take a picture, picture, pix We should be glad to photograph the house and its grounds.我们很乐意为这所房子及其庭院拍照。

adj. [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的 n. 体格检查 同义词:personal, material, natural, medical examination, check-up The World Health Organization says , there are 3 major causes : tobacco use , physical inactivity and an unhealthy diet .世界卫生组织说，有3个主要原因：烟草使用，身体不活动和一个不健康的节食。
adj. 生理学的，生理的 New and more sophisticated methods of physiological control should be available to the seed orchard manager .新的和更先进的生理控制方法，对于种子园管理人员将会有效的。
n. 猪；猪肉；警察 vi. 生小猪；像猪一样过活 同义词:police, copper, swine, pork to pig together in mean huts像猪一样挤在简陋的小屋里
n. 鸽子 同义词:La paloma, dove Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。
vt. 分类；把…留在记忆中；缓办；把…隔成小格 n. 分类架；鸽舍出入口；小房间；鸽棚 同义词:class, categorize, cubby, little room He pigeonholes the request for a new park.他把开辟新公园的请求搁置起来。
n. 药丸；弹丸，子弹；口服避孕药 vt. 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语） vi. 做成药丸；服药丸 同义词:globule, bullet, harry, rob of Sweaters made of wool yarns may have a tendency to pill.由毛线织成的毛衣易起小球。
vi. 渴望，痛苦；憔悴 n. [林] 松树；凤梨，菠萝 vt. 为…悲哀；哀悼 adj. 松木的；似松的 同义词:rare, aspire, ananas, regret, grieve over Then he scraped away the dirt , and exposed a pine shingle .接着他刨去泥土，下面露出一块松木瓦块。
n. 先锋；拓荒者 vt. 开辟；倡导；提倡 vi. 作先驱 同义词:vanguard, avant-courier, advocate, inaugurate The scientists of the country pioneer in cleaning up harbour water.这个国家的科学工作者开创净化港口水域的工作。

n. 管道；输油管；传递途径 同义词:canal, ducting If Americans do not want their oil , then Alberta will build a pipeline to the west coast and sell it to China , they say .他们说，如果美国人不想要这里生产的石油，艾伯塔省将修建一条通向西海岸的石油管线，将石油销售给中国。
n. 比萨（意大利城市） He was the man who climbed the Pisa .他就是那个曾经爬上比萨斜塔。
n. 矿井；深坑；陷阱；（物体或人体表面上的）凹陷；（英国剧场的）正厅后排；正厅后排的观众 vt. 使竞争；窖藏；使凹下；去…之核；使留疤痕 vi. 凹陷；起凹点 同义词:mine, trap, cache, cave, sink marks pitted crabapple去核的山楂
n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平 vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔 vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面 adj. 平的；平面的 同义词:extent, degree, measure, level, airplane, fly in, upsoar, plain, two dimensional The carpenter planed a table smooth.木匠把桌面刨光了。
adj. 行星的 But it forever raised the discussion of resources and human activity to the necessary planetary scale .不过，它永久性地把有关资源和人类活动的讨论提升到了必要的全球范围。
n. 栽植；殖民；大农场 adj. 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的 同义词:settlement, colonization A survey in 2007 found a third of plantation employees live in poverty .2007年的一项调查发现，三分之一种植业园工人生活在贫困之中。
adj. 貌似可信的，花言巧语的；貌似真实的，貌似有理的 同义词:smooth-tongued, rhetoric A more plausible approach could come from bubble fusion .还有一种方式更为合理：气泡核聚变。
vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛 vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛 n. 游戏；比赛；剧本 同义词:sport, broadcast, put on, perform on, game, competition, drama, sport, tournament Bees play about flowers.蜜蜂在花上飞来飞去。
n. 恳求，请求；辩解，辩护；借口，托辞 同义词:explanation, asking, request, prayer, excuse A plea hearing is set for next Monday .服从听证会被安排在下个星期一。
n. 困境；境况；誓约 vt. 保证；约定 同义词:difficulty, corner, dilemma, fix, predicament, undertake, assure He plighted his word to attempt it.他发誓一试。
n. 李子；梅子；洋李；紫红色 adj. 人所希望的；有利的；上等的 同义词:wine, amaranth, favorable, beneficial, advantageous Mr Pope had a plum job and respects the Journal for being an honest newspaper.波普有一份称心的工作，也尊重华尔街日报的诚实正直。
n. 投入；跳进 vi. 投入；陷入；跳进 vt. 使陷入；使投入；使插入 同义词:investment, input, plough into, throw one's self into, let sb in for, let in for to plunge an oar into the water使桨划入水中
n. 正号，加号；好处；附加额 adj. 正的；附加的 prep. 加，加上 同义词:benefit, good, additional, attached, positive, more, second He plused three more points in the game.他在比赛中又得了三分。
n. 财阀；富豪 同义词:zaibatsu, Chaebols The main purpose of plutocrat disintegrate depends on the trustee of abolish administration or enterprise firm or inspect thing .财阀解体的重要目的在于废除行政或事业公司的董事或监事了。
vt. 使用，不住地使用；折，弯；从事 vi. 辛勤工作；定期地来往（船、车等） n. 厚度；板层；褶 同义词:undertake, make use of, fashion, pursue, address, work hard, work like a horse, thickness three-ply三层的

n. 要点；得分；标点；[机] 尖端 vt. 指向；弄尖；加标点于 vi. 表明；指向 同义词:core, main, heart, kernel, essential, direct to, fall on, make known, speak of sth. To divide by 100 is done by only pointing off two figures for decimals.除以100只要在最后两位数前打个小数点。
n. 政治家，政客 同义词:statesman A clever politician knows how to manipulate public opinion .一个聪明的政治家知道如何利用舆论。
n. 污染 同义词:contamination, impureness Air pollution can also cause the disease .空气污染同样会引起该疾病。
adj. 波利尼西亚的；波利尼西亚人的 n. 波利尼西亚人 Anthropologists wondered where the remote ancestors of the Polynesian people now living in the Pacific Islands came from .过去，人类学家也不清楚如今生活在太平洋岛屿上（诸岛）的波利尼西亚人的祖先来自哪里。
adj. 人口稠密的；人口多的 Forests are also gaining ground in the world 's two populous countries , India and China .在世界上两个人口最多的国家——印度和中国，森林面积也在增加。
n. 海豚；鼠海豚 同义词:sea hog, common dolphin The penguins porpoised away on all sides.企鹅向四面八方跳去。
n. 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门 vi. 转向左舷 vt. 持（枪）；左转舵 同义词:haven, bunder Port arms!(口令)持枪!
vt. 描绘；扮演 同义词:represent, play, trace, figure to portray with sure but sparing brush strokes an unforgettable face以肯定然而谨慎的笔触画一张难忘的脸
n. 效能；力量；潜力；权势 同义词:efficiency, strength, might, muscle, power A system of affirmative action has given caste potency .平权措施系统带给种性很大的影响力。

n. 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势 adj. 潜在的；可能的；势的 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, maybe, chance, feasible, possible, underlying, latent The greatest potential , however , is tied up in the housing market .然而最大的潜力，是房地产市场的不动用资金。
n. 潜力；可能性 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, maybe, chance I 'll investigate our market potentiality .我来调查市场潜力。

n. 功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂 vt. 激励；供以动力；使…有力量 vi. 快速前进 adj. 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的 同义词:strength, ability, competence, regime, force, stimulate, bestir, make good time The aircraft is powered by three jet engines.这架飞机由三台喷气发动机驱动。
adj. 预先准备好的 同义词:beforehand As it turned out , several of the venus on the pre- arranged itinerary became scenes of unrest .最后的情况是，行程预先安排要去的几个地方都成了暴乱的现场。
n. 牧师；传教士；鼓吹者 同义词:minister, priest Preacher hired persons to clap their hand .说教者雇一些人来鼓掌。
adj. 危险的；不确定的 同义词:dangerous, critical, risky, threatening Many of the sources of today 's growth are temporary and precarious .当前的经济增长只是暂时的，而且极不稳定。
vt. 预先确定；预先决定；预先查明 同义词:preordain A person's health is often genetically predetermined.人的体质通常是由遗传决定的。
vt. 预报，预言；预知 vi. 作出预言；作预料，作预报 同义词:forecast, advance information The earthquake had been predicted several days before.这次地震早在几天前就已预报到了。
adj. 主要的；卓越的；支配的；有力的；有影响的 同义词:remarkable, excellent, primary, major, prominent It is the land which makes predominant contribution .土地为我们作出了最显著的贡献。
n. 偏见；侵害 vt. 损害；使有偏见 同义词:violation, bias, hurt, blast Your bad spelling may prejudice your chances of getting the job.拼写拙劣会影响你获得这个职位。

n. 准备；预赛；初步措施 adj. 初步的；开始的；预备的 同义词:preparation, arrangement, provision, opening, rudimentary The preliminary results were revealing : the average atrophy was greater in those with lower back pain than was normal .初步结果可是发人深省：遭受下背疼痛之苦的人，大脑平均萎缩程度要比正常人还多。
vt. 引出，预先提出；作为…的前提 n. 前提；上述各项；房屋连地基 vi. 作出前提 同义词:educe, draw forth, precondition Let me premise my argument with a bit of history.让我引述一些史实然后摆出我的观点。
vt. 迷住；使全神贯注 同义词:possess, spell Something seems to be preoccupying her at the moment.她此刻若有所思。
n. 优势；多数；占优势 同义词:majority, superiority, advantage, edge, dominance A second problem is the preponderance of family -controlled firms .另一个问题是家族企业占多数。
vi. 规定；开药方 vt. 规定；开处方 同义词:to stipulate, to formulate, define, regulate, state, rule The supervisor prescribed the steps in which orders must be filled out.主管规定了完成订货的步骤。

vt. 提出；介绍；呈现；赠送 vi. 举枪瞄准 adj. 现在的；出席的 n. 现在；礼物；瞄准 同义词:prefer, file, advance, recommend, assume, current, now, gift, giving, aiming, training, tribute He had the honour of being presented to the king.他有幸觐见国王。
n. 保存，保留 同义词:conservation, hold, retention, reservation The water and soil preservation project was set up in 1989 .其中的水土保护项目是1989年开始启动的。
vt. 保存；保护；维持；腌；禁猎 n. 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品 同义词:maintain, save, secure, corn, sustain, conservation area, conservation district Wax polish preserves wood and leather.上光蜡可以保护木材和皮革。
vt. 压；按；逼迫；紧抱 vi. 压；逼；重压 n. 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机 同义词:push, hug, clic, news bulletin Press this button to start the engine.要开动发动机就按这个按钮。
n. 威望，声望；声誉 同义词:reputation, credit But fighting in Afghanistan is not just about prestige .但是在阿富汗作战不仅仅是威望的问题。
adj. 专横的；放肆的；冒昧的 同义词:imperious, masterful She had struck him as rather presumptuous - indeed it was a part of her charm .他仍然觉得她非常高傲，确实，这是她的一部分魅力所在。
n. 流行；普遍；广泛 同义词:popularity, rifeness To an outsider , the striking thing is the prevalence of assertion and the absence of facts .对局外人来说，引人注目的是断言的充斥和事实的缺乏。
vi. 捕食；掠夺；折磨 n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物 同义词:grind down, lie on, victim, predation The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills.村民们受到山里强盗的抢劫。
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。

n. 普林斯顿（美国新泽西州中部的自治市镇） Other universities with large endowments are also changing their financial aid policies . Examples include Yale , Princeton and the University of Pennsylvania .其他获得捐助的学校也改变了他们的资助政策。包括耶鲁大学，普林斯顿，宾夕法尼亚大学。

n. 原理，原则；主义，道义；本质，本义；根源，源泉 同义词:theory, mechanism, element, essence, parent Nor should it be the principle of bonuses , since a link between performance and reward is desirable .问题也不应出在“发奖金”这一原则上，因为把奖金与业绩挂钩是可取的。
n. 印刷；印刷术 同义词:presswork Please consider the environment before printing this message .在打印这些信息前，请考虑一下环境。
adj. 原始的，古时的；纯朴的 同义词:original, primitive This is suggested by observation of pristine coral reefs in the middle of the Pacific .这是在观察太平洋中部的原始珊瑚礁的报告中提出的。
n. 奖品；奖赏；战利品 vt. 珍视；捕获；估价 adj. 获奖的 同义词:award, capture, assess, acquire, evaluate, value, rate He prized his new car above all his other possessions.所有财产中他最看重的是他的新车。
n. 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率 同义词:possibility, feasibility, potential, maybe, chance This fact lends probability to the story .此事给予这个故事些可能性。
adj. 好探索的；深入锐利的 n. 探索；探查 v. 探索（probe的ing形式） 同义词:ascertainment, exploring, questing He probed the swelling anxiously with his finger.他用手指很担心地触摸肿处。
n. 程序，手续；步骤 同义词:routine, program, move, step The simplest procedure is to immerse the stoppered bottle to the required depth .最简单的方法是将带塞的瓶子浸没在需要的深度。
n. 收入，收益；实收款项 同义词:earning, yield, receipt In any other case alcohol formed as the reaction proceeds cannot be oxidized .在其它任何情况下，反应进行时所生成的醇，不能被氧化。
vt. 处理；加工 n. 过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移 vi. 列队前进 adj. 经过特殊加工（或处理）的 同义词:manufacture, cope with, going on, course, system, method, approach to process leather to make it softer鞣制皮革使其变得柔软
vt. 自称；公开表示；宣称信奉；正式准予加入 vi. 声称；承认；当教授 同义词:accept, recognize I profess that I was surprised at the news.我承认这个消息使我感到惊奇。

adj. 专业的；职业的；职业性的 n. 专业人员；职业运动员 同义词:vocational, specialized, occupational, career man You can , of course , get professional help , but I am not sure if I recommend it .当然，你还可以寻求专业帮助，但我拿不准自己是否该建议你这么做。
adv. 深刻地；深深地；极度地 同义词:deeply, poignantly As for Guantánamo Bay , it is the most profoundly un - American place on the planet : rejoice when it is shut .至于关塔那摩海湾，是世界上最不像美国的地方：当其被关闭时人们会欢欣鼓舞。
n. 进步，发展；前进 vi. 前进，进步；进行 同义词:development, growth, making, advancement, wage, do, go ahead We are progressing fairly with the work.我们正在顺利地进行工作。

vi. 设计；计划；表达；投射 vt. 设计；计划；发射；放映 n. 工程；计划；事业 同义词:design, engineer, design, schedule, engineer, style, frame, engineering, career, enterprise, plan, scheme Our projected visit had to be cancelled.我们计划中的访问不得不取消。
adj. 延长的；拖延的；持续很久的 同义词:drawn-out, stretched-out Cables are usually laid underground that their life prolonged .电缆通常铺设在地下，为的是延长使用期限。

adj. 混杂的；杂乱的 adv. 偶然地；胡乱地 同义词:miscellaneous, jumbly, random, wild, accidentally Their close relatives the meadow voles , by contrast , prefer a solitary , promiscuous existence .相比而言，草甸田鼠-草原田鼠的近亲，则更偏爱独居的，滥交的生活方式。
vt. 促进；提升；推销；发扬 vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子 同义词:facilitate, boost, prefer, upgrade, further He worked hard and was soon promoted.他工作努力，很快就获得提升。
n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权 同义词:performance, nature, ownership, estate, capability By appreciation , we make excellence in others our own property .欣赏能使别人的卓越成为我们自己的财富。
n. [数] 命题；提议；主题；议题 vt. 向…提议；向…求欢 同义词:sentence, theme, subject, offer She was propositioned several times in the course of the evening.整个晚上有人几次向她提出非分要求
n. 推进；推进力 同义词:drive, pulsion But magnetic propulsion has some drawbacks .但是磁力推进有一些缺陷。
n. 前途；预期；景色 vi. 勘探，找矿 vt. 勘探，勘察 同义词:scenery, future, picture, expectation, landscape, reconnoitre, make a survey to prospect a mine勘探矿藏
n. 主角，主演；主要人物，领导者 同义词:leader, Moses In Macbeth , it is ambition that destroys the protagonist .在《麦克白》中，主题则是野心扼杀了主人公。
adj. 精神病学的；精神病治疗的 Much psychiatric medicine is undramatic stuff, involving the prescription of drugs to uncommunicative patients .许多精神病医学平淡无奇，包括给沉默寡言的患者开些处方药。
n. 精神病学家，精神病医生 同义词:alienist, trick cyclist There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face .世界上没有一个精神病学家会像小狗一样舔你的脸。
n. 心理学；心理状态 同义词:mentation, psychological science I take Education Psychology as my major .我以教育心理学为主修专业。
vt. 不时打断；强调；加标点于 vi. 加标点 同义词:emphasize, stress, highlight The pupils have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.小学生尚未学会正确使用标点符号。
adj. 可买的；可买到的 同义词:buyable They purchased life at the expense of honour.他们以牺牲名誉为代价换得了生命。
n. 采购（purchase的ing形式）；购买 同义词:procurement, buy They purchased life at the expense of honour.他们以牺牲名誉为代价换得了生命。
vt. 继续；从事；追赶；纠缠 vi. 追赶；继续进行 同义词:maintain, undertake, address, have, course, give chase, proceed with The police are pursuing an escaped prisoner.警方正在追捕一名越狱逃犯。
vt. 使…困惑；使…为难；苦思而得出 vi. 迷惑；冥思苦想 n. 谜；难题；迷惑 同义词:baffle, discomfit, contemplate, enigma, difficult problem I am puzzled by his failure to reply.他不给我回信使我感到困惑。
adj. 使迷惑的；使莫明其妙的 v. 使迷惑（puzzle的ing形式） 同义词:delusive, confusing, enchanting I am puzzled by his failure to reply.他不给我回信使我感到困惑。
vi. 震动；颤抖 n. 地震；颤抖 同义词:shake up, earthquake, temblor The earth quaked.大地震动了。

n. 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格 同义词:membership, limitation, capacity, condition, restriction Far better to add economics to the core curriculum in every school and make it a qualification for any who would dare to embark on the profession of government.更好的方法是把经济学作为每所学校的核心课程来教授，并且对于任何胆敢从政的人来说，这应该作为一个基本的资格。
adj. 合格的；有资格的 v. 限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予 同义词:regular, entitled, eligible, verbalized His skills qualify him for the work.他的技能使他能担当这项工作。
vt. 抚慰；使安静 vi. 变安静 同义词:silence, placate Can't you quieten those children down?难道你不能让这些孩子安静一点吗?
n. [雷达] 雷达，无线电探测器 Until radar technique was used in astronomy , Man 's knowledge of Venus was still very superficial .直到雷达技术应用于天文学以前，人类对金星的了解还极为肤浅。
n. 辐射；光辉；发光；容光焕发 同义词:flame, brilliance Her mortal frame could not endure the splendors of radiance .她那世人的肉身禁不住炽热的神光。

vt. 辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播 vi. 辐射；流露；发光；从中心向各方伸展 adj. 辐射状的，有射线的 同义词:release, send, broadcast, beam, project, shine on, light emission, spokewise Heat radiates from the heating radiator and spreads to every corner of the room.热从暖气片散发出来并传播到室内各个角落。
n. 辐射；发光；放射物 同义词:irradiation, Geigers But , it really can absorb in radiation .但是，它真的能吸收辐射啊。

adj. 激进的；根本的；彻底的 n. 基础；激进分子；[物化] 原子团；[数] 根数 同义词:thorough, organic, fundamental, ultimate, complete, elements, basis, foundation, base, bed Fourth , it is time for radical reform of finance .第四，是时候对金融业进行彻底改革了。
n. 射频；无线电频率 Warehouse clerks attach radio -frequency identification ( RFID ) tags to pallets .仓管人员在货盘上安装射频识别（RFID）标签。
adj. [核] 放射性的；有辐射的 同义词:emissive They have no problems with the field , but the Koreans are radioactive now .他们在这个领域的能力没有问题，但是现在韩国人碰不得。

n. 范围；幅度；排；山脉 vi. 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到 vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, area, reach, parallel with, feed, grass The salesclerks ranged the goods in good order in the shop-windows.售货员将橱窗中的商品排列得很整齐。

n. 排；等级；军衔；队列 adj. 讨厌的；恶臭的；繁茂的 vt. 排列；把…分等 vi. 列为；列队 同义词:degree, classification, row, range, grade, evil, unpleasant, poisonous, arrange, form, form up His books were ranked tidily on the bookshelf.他的书籍整整齐齐地排列在书架上。
adj. 稀薄的；纯化的 同义词:thin, subtle to rarefy the air使空气稀薄
n. 比率，比例 同义词:rate, scale The census of 2000 and the CASS study both showed the ratio stable at around 120 .2000年的人口普查和中国社会科学院的研究都表明，性别比稳定在120左右。
adj. 合理的；理性的 n. 有理数 同义词:reasonable, logical, possible, just, legitimate In the jargon , they have " rational expectations ".用行话来说，他们具备“理性预期”。
n. [脊椎] 响尾蛇 同义词:Crotale, cascabel rattlesnake swiftly vibrated and shook its tail .响尾蛇急速地摇晃并抖动尾巴。

adj. 生的；未加工的；阴冷的；刺痛的；擦掉皮的；无经验的；（在艺术等方面）不成熟的 n. 擦伤处 vt. 擦伤 同义词:crude, fresh, unripe, brush burn, abrase Organizations do not have to evaluate each product , component or raw material input .组织不需要对每一项产品、分和原料投入都进行评估。

vi. 达到；延伸；伸出手；传开 vt. 达到；影响；抵达；伸出 n. 范围；延伸；河段；横风行驶 同义词:go, range, arrive at, accomplish, affect, extend, influence, impact of, extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, range She reached out her hands and held her mother.她伸出双手抱住她的母亲。
adv. 容易地；乐意地；无困难地 同义词:easily, lightly He readily agreed to help us .他欣然同意帮助我们。
n. 现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为 同义词:actualism Ambition tempered with realism seems to be the right approach .用现实的做法缓和一下野心似乎是正确的手段。
n. 领域，范围；王国 同义词:domain, territory, kingdom, province, world, universe, extent Loop gravity extends this insight into the quantum realm .环圈重力将这个见解援引至量子领域。
adv. 合理地；相当地；适度地 同义词:relatively, fairly, comparatively, pretty, considerably We can reasonably predict a major earthquake in Mexico in the next 50 years .我们可以合理的预测墨西哥在未来50年会有一次大地震。
vt. 召回；回想起，记起；取消 n. 召回；回忆；撤消 同义词:think of, come back, memory, recollection I don't recall what he said at the meeting.我想不起来他在会上说了些什么。
vi. 后退；减弱 vt. 归还 同义词:lower, rein back, replace, return, restore, give again The floods gradually receded from the fields.洪水从田野里逐渐退去。
n. 收到；收据；收入 vt. 收到 同义词:income, proceeds, earning, receive from, to hand The cashier receipted the bill.出纳员在账单上盖上“收讫”印记。
vt. 叙述；重新计算 n. 重算 同义词:relate, narrate, roll-back He recounted his experiences to the pupils.他向学生们讲述他的经历。
n. 娱乐；消遣；休养 同义词:entertainment, pleasure, sport, occupation, amusement My only recreation has been watching TV .我惟一的娱乐就是看电视。

n. 招聘；新兵；新成员 vt. 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康 vi. 复原；征募新兵；得到补充；恢复健康 同义词:hands wanted, big john, supply, to replenish, be cured of, pull round The wartime cabinet first recruited men into the forces from non-essential industries.战时内阁首先从非重点工业中招募人员补充武装力量。
n. 恢复；复原 同义词:recovery, restoration, regression, rehabilitation, retrieval He has recuperated his health.他已恢复健康。
n. 精炼厂；提炼厂；冶炼厂 同义词:smeltery, metallurgical plant The government has delayed approvals of new alumina refinery projects .政府延迟批准建立新的氧化铝精炼厂计划。
vt. 反映；反射，照出；反省 vi. 反射，映现；深思 同义词:glass, image, give back, flash back The high wall reflects sounds.这面高墙将声音反射回来。
n. 冰箱，冷藏库 同义词:icebox, freezer I saw a refrigerator in the dining room .我在餐室里看见了一个电冰箱。
n. 政权，政体；社会制度；管理体制 同义词:government, power An " axis of evil " branded ripe for " regime change ".“邪恶轴心”“政权更迭”的时机已经成熟。
n. 地区；范围；部位 同义词:area, extent, boundary, zone, spectrum, territory It was the only party to launch a serious election campaign in the violent region .在一个充满暴力的地区，这是唯一一个发起真正选举游说的政党。

adj. 统治的；在位的；本届的；起支配作用的 v. 统治；支配；盛行（reign的ing形式） 同义词:ruling, dominant, governing, guiding On Monday , home side Chicago bears stunned the reigning Super Bowl champion Dallas Cowboys .星期一，芝加哥黑熊队丰场挫败了超级碗赛卫冕冠军达拉斯牛仔队。
vt. 拒绝；排斥；抵制；丢弃 n. 被弃之物或人；次品 同义词:refuse, negative, inferior, degraded product I rejected his suggestion.我不同意他的建议。
adj. 有关系的，有关联的；讲述的，叙述的 v. 叙述（relate过去式） 同义词:participant, narrative, give an account of He related what he had seen in the theatre.他把在剧场中所看到的情况叙述了一遍。
vi. 放松，休息；松懈，松弛；变从容；休养 vt. 放松；使休息；使松弛；缓和；使松懈 同义词:lighten up, ease down, rest, lighten up Relax your muscles before starting to run.起跑前应将肌肉放松。
n. 放松；缓和；消遣 同义词:entertainment, occupation, recreation Relaxation methods , such as meditation , are useful ways to bring your emotions into balance .放松的方法，例如：沉思，是有用的方法来让你的感情出于平衡。
vt. 释放；发射；让与；允许发表 n. 释放；发布；让与 同义词:deliver, send, free, project, convey, liberation, issuance He was released from prison after serving a sentence of five years.他在服刑五年后从狱中释放出来。
adj. 有关的；中肯的；有重大作用的 同义词:concerned, involved But you still want more , and now is the time to dig deeper for relevant information .但是，如果你还希望了解更多，那么现在就是对相关信息深挖掘的时候。
n. 信赖；信心；受信赖的人或物 同义词:belief, confidence, trust, hope Yet there was a common ingredient in most failures : an over- reliance on wholesale borrowing .但是大部分银行的倒闭有一点共因：过度依赖大规模贷款。
n. 救济；减轻，解除；安慰 同义词:comfort, almsgiving Time , the best physician of the mind , at length brought me relief .时间，这位最擅于医治心灵的大夫，终于安慰了我。
n. 宗教；宗教信仰 同义词:deen, religious belief Religion is not the only source of division .宗教问题并不是分裂的唯一来源。
vt. 补救；治疗；纠正 n. 补救；治疗；赔偿 同义词:cure, help, repair, therapy, satisfaction, cure These tablets will do nothing to remedy my sore throat.这些药片一点也治不了我的嗓子疼。
n. 回忆；怀旧；引起联想的相似事物 同义词:memory, recall William did not share his brother 's passion for reminiscence .威利并没有分享弟弟回忆往事的幽思。
adj. 遥远的；偏僻的；疏远的 n. 远程 同义词:distant, lonely It is said that people on the remote coasts of Newfoundland , a province in Canada .据说那些住在纽芬兰（加拿大的一个省）遥远的海岸线上的人。
vt. 致使；提出；实施；着色；以…回报 vi. 给予补偿 n. 打底；交纳；粉刷 同义词:introduce, present, prefer, file, advance, cosmetic brush He rendered a report to the commander-in-chief.他向总司令作了汇报。
n. 约会；约会地点；集结地 vi. 会合；约会 vt. 在指定地点与…相会 同义词:date, engagement, link up, make an appointment We'll rendezvous at the railway station tomorrow afternoon.我们明天下午在火车站会合。
n. 偿还；[金融] 付还 同义词:payment, liquidation Collateral , such as property or investments , secures repayment of traditional loans .抵押品是传统贷款的安全保证，通常包括财产或投资抵押。
n. 代表；表现；表示法；陈述 同义词:presentation, statement, deputy, behalf of, ambassador Our firm has adequate representation in Europe .本公司在欧洲有足够的代理权。
adj. 典型的，有代表性的；代议制的 n. 代表；典型；众议员 同义词:typical, characteristic, deputy, model, behalf of, ambassador I was a field representative for five years for a large commercial school .我曾经在家大型的商贸学校担任过五年的区域代表。
n. 名誉；声望 vt. 名誉；认为；把…称为 同义词:credit, name, prestige, expect, count, guess, find, feel He was reputed to be a millionaire.大家说他是个百万富翁。
vt. 怨恨；愤恨；厌恶 同义词:hate, be down on His father seems to resent my being here.我呆在这里他的父亲似乎不大高兴。
adj. 充满忿恨的；厌恶的 同义词:sick, laith At home , it faced a shocked and resentful population .在国内它面对着震惊和不满的老百姓。
vi. 重置；清零 vt. 重置；重新设定；重新组合 n. 重新设定；重新组合；重排版 同义词:to clear, reassociation, recompounding After the evening party they reset the tables and chairs.晚会开完以后，他们将桌椅重新摆好。
n. 阻力；电阻；抵抗；反抗；抵抗力 同义词:resisting force, rebellion Meditation counteracts this effect of stress on insulin resistance .冥想抵消了压力导致的胰岛素阻抗。

n. 凭借，手段；度假胜地；常去之地 vi. 求助，诉诸；常去；采取某手段或方法 同义词:instrument, shift, road, tool, implement, appeal, ask for help Many teachers and students resort to Beidaihe beach in the summer vacation.很多教师和学生在暑假中去北戴河海滨。
n. 尊敬，尊重；方面；敬意 vt. 尊敬，尊重；遵守 同义词:estimation, aspect, regard, side, worship, honor, esteem, worship All students should respect their teachers.凡是学生就应当尊敬老师。

adv. 分别地；各自地，独自地 同义词:separately, alone, in several In all cases , the enzymes can be dissociated into two distinct protein components , termed A and B , respectively .在所有情况下，这个酶均可分解成两个不同的蛋白质组分，分别称作A和b。
n. 责任，职责；义务 He binds himself to the responsibility .他以那责任来约束自己。
vt. 保持；雇；记住 同义词:keep up, to keep If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。
n. 保留；扣留，滞留；记忆力；闭尿 同义词:memory, preservation, mind, hold, reservation The bonuses were retention payments .红利是保留性支付。
n. 撤退；休息寓所；撤退 vi. 撤退；退避；向后倾 vt. 退（棋）；使后退 同义词:withdrawal, pullback, withdraw, bug out The enemy was forced to retreat from the city.敌人被迫撤出这个城市。
n. 报应；惩罚；报答；报偿 同义词:punishment, rod, payment, discipline, reward Compared with the S days , in other words , the level of retribution so far seems almost non -existent.换言之，与储贷危机时期相比，迄今的惩罚力度似乎可以忽略不计。
vi. 骑马；乘车；依靠；漂浮 vt. 骑；乘；控制 n. 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路 同义词:horse, trust, swim, possess, regulate, contain, manage, bottle, vehicle, embarkation She got on her bike and rode quickly to school.她登上自行车迅速骑往学校。
adj. 严格的；僵硬的，死板的；坚硬的；精确的 同义词:strict, precise, wooden, accurate, mathematical It is a rigid dogma .这是一种僵硬的教条。
adj. 环形的；环状的；圆形的 同义词:circular, endless, annular Rotating black holes are known as Kerr black holes , which can indeed have ring-shaped singularity .旋转的黑洞被称为科尔黑洞，它们其实呈现为一个环形的整体。
vi. 按铃；敲钟；回响；成环形 n. 戒指；铃声，钟声；拳击场；环形物 vt. 按铃；包围；敲钟；套住 同义词:sound, bell, annulus, invest, case The telephone rang again when I left the office.在我离开办公室时电话的铃声又响起来。
adj. 强健的；健康的；粗野的；粗鲁的 同义词:healthy, crude, gross, fine, rough a robust faith坚定的信念

n. 棒；惩罚；枝条；权力 同义词:punishment, authority, payment, bar, discipline Cars honked behind him . The mahout turned and gesticulated at him with rod . A passerby yelled at him not to block traffic .身后响起了汽车喇叭声，看象人也用小铁棒向他比划着，一个过路人更对他吼着让他不要妨碍交通。
n. 角色；任务 同义词:workers, mission, part, assignment, character The actor won an Academy Award for his role in the film .那位演员由于他在电影中扮演的角色而获学院奖。
adj. 浪漫的；多情的；空想的 n. 浪漫的人 vt. 使…浪漫化 同义词:fantastic, amorous Gray and Burns were precursors of the Romantic movement in English Literature .格雷和伯恩斯是英国文学浪漫主义运动的先驱。
vi. 浪漫化；传奇化 vt. 使浪漫化；使传奇化 同义词:legendize Don't romanticize this uninteresting and hard work !不要使传奇地说这个没有兴趣而且艰苦的工作！
n. 根；根源；词根；祖先 vi. 生根；根除 vt. 生根，固定；根源在于 同义词:parent, principle, father, radix, radicate, fix on, hold in place Roses will not root in such acid soil.玫瑰在这种酸性土壤中不会生根。
n. 绳，绳索 vt. 捆，绑 vi. 拧成绳状 同义词:line, cord, bundle, colligate They roped their cases and trunks for additional safety.为了更加安全起见，他们把大小箱子都用绳子捆好。

n. 腐烂；腐败；腐坏 vi. 腐烂；腐败；堕落 vt. 使腐烂；使腐朽；使堕落 int. （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了 同义词:corruption, decomposition, fall into decay, blet, corrupt, eat out, rats, fiddlesticks All the peaches rotted on the tree.所有的桃子都在树上烂掉了。
vi. 旋转；循环 vt. 使旋转；使转动；使轮流 adj. [植] 辐状的 同义词:wheel, circle, spin, turn, spin, swing The moon rotates around the earth.月球围绕着地球旋转。
adv. 粗糙地；概略地 同义词:coarsely, crudely It would cover roughly 80% of the economy .毕竟减排将涉及到大约80%的经济。
vt. 唤醒；激起，使振奋；惊起 vi. 醒来；奋起 n. 觉醒；奋起 同义词:arouse, wake sb. up, wake up, waken up, arousal, wakefulness It's time to rouse them.该叫醒他们了。
vt. 按某路线发送 n. 路线；航线；通道 同义词:door, vector, exit, channel, thread All the goods were routed by way of the Netherlands.一切货物均经由荷兰运送。
adj. 英国的；（英国）皇家的 同义词:classical, distinguished, house-hold A pilot found a balloon , it seemed like it was flying to a royal Air Force Station .一个飞行员发现了一只气球，它像是正飞往附近的一个皇家空军基地。
vt. 擦；摩擦；惹怒 vi. 擦；摩擦；擦破 n. 摩擦；障碍；磨损处 同义词:wipe, mop up, mop up, wipe, friction, bar, obstacle, dam, let He rubbed his forehead with the back of his hand.他用手背擦了擦前额。
adj. 崎岖的；坚固的；高低不平的；粗糙的 同义词:crude, rough, harsh, coarse I say again , have we sought this country of a rugged soil and wintry sky?我再问一遍，我们为什么来到这个土地不平、气候寒冷的国度？
n. 隆隆声；辘辘声 v. 隆隆作响；喃喃地讲话（rumble的ing形式） 同义词:thrump, brattle The thunder rumbled.雷声隆隆。

adj. 破败的；衰弱的 n. 刺杀出局；总结 同义词:marasmic, infirm, summa, sum-up Her world was run -down streets , rubble - filled building sites , warehouses and litter - strewn front steps .她的世界是破败不堪的街道、碎石迷乱的建筑工地、仓库以及垃圾遍地的楼梯。
vi. 经营；奔跑；运转 vt. 管理，经营；运行；参赛 n. 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程 同义词:go, fare, conduct, direct, control, supervise, operate, footrace, tendency to sth They came running to meet me.他们跑着来迎接我。
adj. 农村的，乡下的；田园的，有乡村风味的 同义词:country, sylvan Rural children face the same risks as city children .乡村孩子和城市孩子面临同样的危险。
adv. 无情地；残忍地；冷酷地 同义词:inexorably, heartlessly The iron wheels of the epoch , ran them ruthlessly .时代的铁轮，辗过他们的身躯。

adj.
