n. 神圣；尊崇为神物；受人尊敬 同义词:holiness, heavenliness And so we broke into the concept of the sacredness of private property .因此我们打破了私有财产神圣不可侵犯的观念。
adj. 安全的；可靠的；平安的 n. 保险箱；冷藏室；纱橱 同义词:responsible, secure, honest, reliable, tried, peter, strongbox Today we talk about how to stay warm , dry and safe .今天，我们来讨论如何保持温暖、干燥和安全。
n. 传说；冒险故事；英雄事迹 同义词:tradition, tale, fame Chesney died 30 years ago , but saga of his IRA involvement has refused to do likewise.切斯尼在30年前死去，但是他卷入的爱尔兰共和军却拒绝随之消身匿迹。
n. 唾液；涎 同义词:slabber, sputum They measured the amount of testosterone in their subjects saliva .他们测量研究对象唾液中睾丸激素的含量大小。

n. 饱满；饱食；满足；厌腻 同义词:content, fill A new excitement is only an additional satiation .一种新的刺激只是已经餍足了添加物。
n. 一种德国泡菜 Sauerkraut is cabbage fermented in its own juice .德国泡菜是在自己的汁中发酵的卷心菜。
adj. 野蛮的；残酷的；狂怒的；荒凉的 n. 未开化的；粗鲁的人；残暴成性的人 vt. 乱咬；粗暴的对待 同义词:wild, cruel, iron, desert, yahoo, woodenness to be savaged by a wild horse被野马踢伤
n. 大草原，热带草原（等于savanna） 同义词:prairie, steppe Kroger store on Wilmington Island near Savannah donated a year 's supply of diapers and other baby needs .靠近萨凡纳的威尔明顿岛有一家克罗格商店提出要给婴儿们免费提供一年的尿片和婴儿用品。
n. 头皮；战利品 vt. 剥头皮 vi. 剥头皮 同义词:prize, capture to scalp the slab把原板刨平
n. 食腐动物；清道夫；[助剂] 清除剂；拾荒者 同义词:street sweeper, ashman Glutathione peroxidase ( GSH-Px) acts as a free radical scavenger .谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶是生物机体内的自由基清除剂。
n. 场面；情景；景象；事件 同义词:event, circumstance, occurrence, incident, matter rock music scene摇滚乐界
adj. 怀疑的；怀疑论的；习惯怀疑的 同义词:skeptical, suspicious AFTER all the blood and blunders , people are right to sceptical when good news is announced from Iraq .在经历了之前所有的流血与失误之后，人们有理由对从伊拉克传来的好消息感到怀疑。
n. 怀疑；怀疑论；怀疑主义 同义词:doubt, challenge, suspicion Scepticism remains on whether Malaysia can follow through on its promises .仍有人怀疑马来西亚能否将承诺坚持到底。

adj. 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的 v. 使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式） 同义词:complicated, experienced, involved, detailed, exquisite, mystified He has now been sophisticated.他现在已变得老于世故了。
n. 复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养 同义词:complexity, intricacy If the price of sophistication is instability , something is wrong .如果复杂的代价是不稳定，那么某些东西是错了。
adj. 疼痛的，痛心的；剧烈的，极度的；恼火的，发怒的；厉害的，迫切的 n. 溃疡，痛处；恨事，伤心事 同义词:excessive, severe, painful, extreme, smart, ulcer, sorrow At first all of us city boys hiked on very sore feet .起初，我们这些城市孩子都迈着疼痛的确双脚行走。
n. 悲伤；懊悔；伤心事 vi. 懊悔；遗憾；感到悲伤 vt. 为…悲痛 同义词:soreness, disconsolateness, feel sad to sorrow at a bad news对噩耗感到悲伤

vt. 听（诊）；测量，测…深；使发声；试探；宣告 n. 声音，语音；噪音；海峡；吵闹；听力范围；[医] 探条 adj. 健全的，健康的；合理的；可靠的；有效彻底的 adv. 彻底地，充分地 vi. 听起来；发出声音；回响；测深 同义词:hear, feel, scale, voice, speech, noise, neck, row, healthy, reasonable, responsible, honest, logical, thoroughly, fully, entirely, completely, well, ring, noise Yes, yes, I know. No need to sound so loud!行了，行了，我知道。不用这么大嗓门。
n. 音响；试探；测探水深 adj. 发出声音的 同义词:fishing, feeler Sounding her deep , resonant siren , the S. S. Jiangjin forges ahead .“江津”号昂奋而深沉的鸣响着汽笛向前方航进。

vt. 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让 vi. 饶恕，宽恕；节约 adj. 多余的；瘦的；少量的 n. 剩余；备用零件 同义词:economize on, save on, excuse from, economize on, thin, unnecessary, waste, redundant, superfluous, surplus, residual to spare one's enemy宽恕了仇人
n. [临床] 痉挛；抽搐；一阵发作 同义词:fit, tic spasm of introspection soon turned into a blame game and Mr Badawi was forced to say he would resign .刚抽完内省之风，一场互相指责的闹剧旋即上演，巴达维也被迫宣布辞职。
adj. 空间的；存在于空间的；受空间条件限制的 同义词:dimensional, spacial The TES instrument has fairly low spatial resolution : a pixel is several kilometers across.TES仪器的空间解析度相当低：一个像素大约代表数公里。
n. 专门化；特殊化；特化作用 This may be possible in a village society with rudimentary specialization .这种情况在初具专业化的乡村社会中是可能的。

adv. 特别地；明确地 同义词:particularly, extra, definitely, positively, explicitly Men in the Copenhagen study maintained a stable body weight over the two week period -- but they were specifically instructed to attempt to do so.在哥本哈根研究中，男人们在两个星期多内保持了稳定的体重——但他们是被特别指示尝试这样做的。
n. 样品，样本；标本 同义词:pattern, swatch The problem before us is where we can find specimen .我们面前的问题是我们在哪儿能找到标本。
n. 景象，奇观；眼镜；引人羡慕的人 同义词:scene, sight Ordinary citizens had to watch the spectacle on television .普通公民只能在电视上观看庆典。
n. 观众；旁观者 同义词:audience, onlooker But the crazy thing is that people still do go just to be a spectator at other people 's inability to sing .但是，当你不得不听那些没有唱歌天赋的人不停的唱歌，那真是件令人疯狂的事情。
n. 范围；球体 vt. 包围；放入球内；使…成球形 adj. 球体的 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, range, case, invest a mountain village sphered by trees万树丛中的小山村

n. 螺旋；旋涡；螺旋形之物 adj. 螺旋形的；盘旋的 vt. 使成螺旋形；使作螺旋形上升 vi. 盘旋；成螺旋形；螺旋形上升（过去式spiraled/spiralled，过去分词spiraled/spiralled，现在分词spiraling/spiralling，第三人称单数spirals，副词spirally） 同义词:screw, helix, helical, gyroidal The eagle spirals up into the sky.鹰盘旋着飞上了高空。
n. 态度（spirit的复数）；精力 v. 使振作（spirit的第三人称单数形式） 同义词:postures, nerves I spirited him with a cup of coffee.我用一杯咖啡让他清醒起来。

n. 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑 vi. 游戏 vt. 游戏；参加体育运动；夸耀 adj. 运动的 同义词:movement, entertainment, exercise, campaign, game, air, make a display of, athletic, kinetic They Sported for a while, and then went to bed.玩耍了一会儿，他们便上床睡觉了。
n. 喷雾；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 同义词:foam, atomizer, eject, sparge, spritz to spray water from its mouth从其嘴中喷射出水来

vi. 传播；伸展 vt. 传播，散布；展开；伸展；铺开 n. 传播；伸展 adj. 伸展的 同义词:extend, push, distribute, string, transmit, circulation, extension, propagation, diffusion, extense, patulous to spread one's books on the desk把一堆书摊放在课桌上
vt. 侦察；发现；暗中监视 vi. 侦察；当间谍 n. 间谍；密探 同义词:detect, scout around, scout around, keek, illegal, espionage He has been accused of spying.他被控犯有从事间谍罪。
n. 空军中队；一群；骑兵中队；分遣队；小舰队 vt. 把…编成中队 同义词:pack, cohort Yet just such squadron has flown to the rescue of capitalism 's finest.没错，资本主义核心的救星正是这支来自波斯湾和亚洲的直升机中队。
vi. 嚎啕；尖叫 n. 暴风；麻烦；高声哭喊；尖叫 vt. 尖声叫着；大声哭喊；起风暴 同义词:pipe, scream, trouble, headache, hurricane She squalled when she saw a mouse.她看见一只老鼠时高声尖叫起来。

adj. 平方的；正方形的；直角的；正直的 vt. 使成方形；与…一致 vi. 一致；成方形 n. 平方；广场；正方形 adv. 成直角地 同义词:straight, just, orthogonal, accord with, jibe with, cotton, identify, coincide, plaza, concourse to square a sheet of paper把纸裁成方形
vi. 告密；吱吱叫；侥幸成功 n. 吱吱声；机会 vt. 以短促尖声发出 同义词:inform, rat, opportunity, chance, opening, room, occasion The milk cart squeaked out of the village.运奶车吱吱地响着慢慢驶出了村子。
n. 桩，棍子；赌注；火刑；奖金 vt. 资助，支持；系…于桩上；把…押下打赌 vi. 打赌 同义词:bonus, dividend, encourage, carry, fund, second, back, lay, make a bet to stake out the boundaries of标出…的界限
n. 货摊；畜栏；托辞 vi. 停止，停转；拖延 vt. 拖延；使停转；使陷于泥中 同义词:booth, concession stand, desist from, come to a stop, prolong, drag on He stalled his car near the exit.他把他的车停放在靠近出口处的车位上。
vi. 站立；位于；停滞 vt. 使站立；忍受；抵抗 n. 站立；立场；看台；停止 同义词:sit, lie on, stomach, go, tough, abide, sustain, stop, stay Don't stand. Take a seat, please.别站着，请坐下。
n. 星，恒星；明星；星形物 vt. 用星号标于；由…主演，由…担任主角 vi. 担任主角 adj. 明星的，主角的；星形的 同义词:lucida, feature, stellate He starred his boat.他在他的船体上用星星作装饰。
n. 右舷 vt. 向右转舵 vi. 向右转舵 adj. 右舷的 Starboard 15°,40 cables!右舷15度，40链!
n. 政治家；国务活动家 同义词:politician Among a people general corrupt , liberty cannot long exist . ----- Edmond Burke statesman .一个普遍腐败的民族，自由无法长存。——埃德蒙·伯克。
adj. 坚定的；忠诚的；坚固的 vt. 止住；止血 同义词:committed, loving, firm, confirmed, devoted, rein in, rein up He is as staunch a churchman at Oxford .他跟牛津的教士一样坚定不移。
adj. 陡峭的；不合理的；夸大的；急剧升降的 vt. 泡；浸；使…充满 vi. 泡；沉浸 n. 峭壁；浸渍 同义词:tall, unreasonable, dip, dunk, crag, krantz to steep the tea in hot water用热水泡茶
vt. 使陡峭 vi. 变陡峭 Widespread reactions of this sort could steepen its dive .普遍这类反应将会加快它的跳水。
adv. 陡峭地；险峻地 同义词:precipitously, bluffly Then the slope rises ever steeply as bacteria proliferate until it reaches an inflection point .接下来随着细菌的繁殖，斜线向上急速增长，直到达到转折点为止。
vt. 使用铅版；套用老套，使一成不变 n. 陈腔滥调，老套；铅版 同义词:truism, conventionality to stereotype a painting with dark colour以陈旧方式用深色颜料作画
adj. 用铅版印刷的；老一套的 v. 把…浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype的过去分词） 同义词:banal, trite to stereotype a painting with dark colour以陈旧方式用深色颜料作画

n. 船尾；末端 adj. 严厉的；坚定的 同义词:terminal, bottom, extreme, severe, committed, firm, confirmed, tight Alas , experience is a " lantern on stern , which shines only on the waves behind us ".唉，经验就是“一盏船尾的灯，它只在我们身后的波涛上放光”。
vt. 刺，戳；伸出；粘贴 vi. 坚持；伸出；粘住 n. 棍；手杖；呆头呆脑的人 同义词:extend, finger, pink, stay, hold out, canne, bastinade to stick a young pine用杆支撑住一棵小松树

adv. 仍然；更；静止地 adj. 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的 n. 寂静；剧照；蒸馏室 conj. 仍然；但是；尽管如此 vt. 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来 vi. 静止；平静；蒸馏 同义词:toujours, statically, peaceful, pacific, quiet, calm, silent, silence, quietude, and, granted, but, yet, only, cool, fine-still, rest Is he still here?他还在这儿吗?
n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vi. 拉紧；尽力 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 同义词:tension, burden, weight, tauten, take pains, abuse, tighten up to strain a rope拉紧绳子
n. 层；地层；阶层 同义词:thickness, layer, degree, tier In parallel or concordant bedding the strata overlay each other like pages of a book.在平行的或者整合的层面中，地层好象书页一般互相重迭。
n. 同温层观测镜；[地质] 地层检查仪

adv. 严格地；完全地；确实地 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, fully Hired labor is strictly prohibited from gleaning , as this would tempt them to leave good fruit during harvest .雇工是严格禁止收摘剩余果实的，因为这会诱使他们的故意不收摘好果实。
adj. 显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的 v. 打（strike的ing形式） 同义词:prominent, obvious, marked, tremendous, noted, beating He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
n. 士的宁；番木鳖碱 同义词:brucine AIM : To study preparation of strychnine solid liposome .目的：探讨番木鳖碱固体脂质体的最佳制备方法。
n. 学生；学者 同义词:scholar, academic, pupil Was she a good student ?她是一个好学生吗？
n. 愚蠢；糊涂事 同义词:simplicity, folly She looked at him stupidly , and he , with equal stupidity , returned the gaze .她呆头呆脑地望着他，他呢，也同样呆头呆脑地注视着她。
vt. 征服；抑制；减轻 同义词:master, stay, restrain, moderate Rome subdued Gaul.罗马帝国征服了高卢。
n. 潜水艇；海底生物 adj. 海底的；水下的 vt. 用潜水艇攻击 vi. 在下疾行；在下滑动 同义词:sub, pigboat, benthonic, undersea submarine at last emerged .潜水艇终于露出水面。
vt. 使服从；主张；呈递 vi. 提交；服从 同义词:maintain, advocate, put in, hand in Should you submit yourself to him?你应该顺从他吗?
adv. 随后，其后；后来 同义词:after, since South African officials said part of their border with Zimbabwe was subsequently a "disaster area ".南非官员说部分与津巴布韦接壤的地区随后已经被确定为疫区。
adj. 屈从的；奉承的；有用的；有帮助的 同义词:useful, helpful, assistant " How are you feeling now , sir ?" he asked , with the subservient smirk .“现在，你觉得怎么样了，先生？”他含着谄媚的假笑问。

adj. 大量的；实质的；内容充实的 n. 本质；重要材料 同义词:massive, extensive, macro, much, volume, essence, entity, principle, texture, interior This generated profit , but any substantial technical innovations required the approval of management and a re -engineering of the entire network .这是有益的，但是任何实质的技术创新都需要管理层的批准，并需要对整个网络进行重构。
adj. 郊区的，城郊的；土气的；见闻不广的 n. 郊区居民 We live on a quiet suburban cul-de-sac , which we value as a safe place to raise our family .我们住在一个安静的郊区死胡同，那个地方我们认为非常的安全，足够保护我们一家。
vt. 遭受；忍受；经历 vi. 遭受，忍受；受痛苦；经验；受损害 同义词:stomach, stand, experience, tough, abide, stomach, come under He is suffering from the loss of his old friend.他正遭受失去老朋友的痛苦。
vt. 使满足；足够…用；合格 vi. 足够；有能力 同义词:content, gratify, serve, be in a position It suffices to comfort her with only a few words.只用几句话安慰她一下就行了。
adv. 充分地；足够地 同义词:fully, adequately, well, enough, wide The verdict of jury sufficiently shows how the evidence preponderated in their minds .陪审员的裁决充分说明他们心里偏重于哪一方面的证据。
n. 建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象 同义词:advice, proposal, instance, recommendation, trace Shall I give you a written suggestion ?需要我给您一份书面建议吗？
n. 顶点；最高级会议；最高阶层 adj. 最高级的；政府首脑的 同义词:height, sky, peak, apex, crown, first-chop, ritzy He kept Stalin company to summit during the World War Ⅱ.第二次世界大战期间他曾陪伴斯大林参加过最高级会谈。
n. 日落，傍晚 同义词:Sundown, early evening Please remember , this happens immediately after a sunset . Never look directly at the setting sun .请记住，这只会发生在日落后的一瞬间。不要直接看正在下落的太阳。
vt. 添加；重叠；附加；安装 同义词:fit, fix I think you ought to superimpose the great trust of mine on your heart.我想你应该牢记住我对你的重托。
adj. 超自然的；神奇的，不可思议的 n. 超自然现象；不可思议的事 同义词:magic, mysterious, supranatural In that case a sense of being watched by a supernatural being might be useful.这种方式是让人们感到有一种超自然的东西在监视着他。
n. 迷信 同义词:aberglaube, fetish Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition .科学是对于宗教狂及迷信之毒的大消毒剂。
adj. 迷信的；由迷信引起的 同义词:fetishistic The superstitious regard it as a bad omen .迷信的人认为那是一种恶兆。
n. 上层建筑；上部构造 Democracy is part of the superstructure .法律被认为是上层建筑的一部分。

adj. 最高的；至高的；最重要的 n. 至高；霸权 同义词:highest, maximum, peak, top, principal, hegemony FACTS , ruled America's Supreme Court in 1918 in the " hot news doctrine ", cannot be copyrighted .1918年，美国最高法院就案件“热点新闻学说”，裁定事实不能上版权。
n. 剩余；[贸易] 顺差；盈余；过剩 adj. 剩余的；过剩的 同义词:residual, spare, remaining, residual, odd When was that old tank surplused out?那辆破坦克是什么时候卖出去的?
n. 调查；测量；审视；纵览 vt. 调查；勘测；俯瞰 vi. 测量土地 同义词:investigation, measurement, probe, research, examine, check into He surveyed Arthur Hailey's novels before presenting the award.颁奖之前他概括地评述了阿瑟黑利的小说。
n. 幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物 同义词:remanet, leavings It increases the chances of survival and reduces the danger of brain damage .它增加了存活的机会并且降低了大脑损害的危险。
adj. 易受影响的；易感动的；容许…的 n. 易得病的人 同义词:impressionable, suggestible Infants are particularly susceptible to vitamin D intoxication .婴儿尤其容易引起维生素d中毒。
n. 嫌疑犯 adj. 可疑的；不可信的 vt. 怀疑；猜想 vi. 怀疑；猜想 同义词:sus, doubtful, questionable, dispute, imagine, wonder, question, wonder, imagine, question, suppose I suspect he is a thief.我怀疑他是贼。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量
n. 食物；生计；支持 同义词:food, diet, holding, eating, support They wanted to see him , because they wanted to draw a certain sustenance from his strength .他们想见到他，因为他们想从他的实力里吸取某种养料。
vt. 忍受；吞没 vi. 吞下；咽下 n. 燕子；一次吞咽的量 同义词:stomach, go, stand, abide, tough, get sth down, get down He contracted his brows and swallowed medicine down.他皱了皱眉头，然后一口把药水喝了下去。

vt. 影响；统治；使摇动 vi. 影响；摇摆 n. 影响；摇摆；统治 同义词:affect, influence, impact of, impact on, reach, impact of, impact on, work on, effect, influence, infection, impression, governance The tree has swayed down to the wall.那棵树已歪倒在墙上。
vt. 发誓；咒骂 vi. 发誓，宣誓；诅咒 n. 宣誓；诅咒 同义词:plight one's troth, cross my heart, plight one's troth, take an oath, juration, oath I can swear by my reputation.我敢以我的名誉起誓。

n. 摇摆；摆动；秋千；音律；涨落 vi. 摇摆；转向；悬挂；大摇大摆地行走 vt. 使旋转；挥舞；悬挂 adj. 旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的 同义词:bob, ricketiness, turn towards, sense of rotation, turn, hang, spin, rotary, rolling, revolutionary to swing one's arms while walking走路时摆臂
vi. 猛扑；突然袭击；突然下降；飞扑 n. 猛扑；俯冲；突然袭击 vt. 攫取；抓去 同义词:bound on, surprise attack, surprise, subduction, grab, pounce at The owl swooped down on a mouse.猫头鹰向一只老鼠飞扑过去。
n. 同情；慰问；赞同 同义词:acceptance, feeling, compassion, pity We sympathy for your family .对你们家庭我们深表同情。
n. [临床] 症状；征兆 同义词:premonitor, prefiguration One symptom is bloating , or expansion of the abdomen area .一种症状就是肿胀，或者在腹部产生膨胀。
vt. 合成；综合 vi. 合成；综合 同义词:compound, colligate Then he synthesized his statement before winding it up.结束陈述前，他综述了一下他的观点。
adj. 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的 同义词:scientific, classified Evolution can be thought of as systematic error management .进化可以理解为系统的误差管理。
n. 高原；台地 同义词:meseta, altiplano Night slowly reached tableland .夜，款款地来到高原上。
n. 禁忌；禁止 adj. 禁忌的；忌讳的 vt. 禁忌；禁止 同义词:ban, don't, ticklish, bar, inhibit The subject was tabooed.这个话题禁止讨论。
n. 蝌蚪 同义词:pollywog Tadpole 2 : Is she on the lotus ?小蝌蚪2：她是不是在荷叶上啊？
n. 接受者；接受打赌的人；捕获者 同义词:receiver, recipient The double flexible rapier consists of a giver and taker similar to the double rigid rapier .挠性双剑杆与刚性双剑杆相同，也有一只递纬剑，一只接纬剑。
adj. 驯服的；平淡的；乏味的；顺从的 vt. 驯养；使变得平淡；制服 vi. 变得驯服 同义词:stupid, docile, domesticate, bring under It's hard to tame a tiger.驯虎不易。
adj. 有形的；切实的；可触摸的 n. 有形资产 同义词:concrete, bodied, material property Now America must demand , and receive , the tangible support it implies.现在，美国务必要求、并接受其所必需的切实支持。
n. 坦克；水槽；池塘 vt. 把…贮放在柜内；打败 vi. 乘坦克行进 同义词:trough, mere, beat, best She lost so quickly that we thought she had tanked.她输得太快，我们都认为她是故意的。
n. 焦油；柏油；水手 vt. 涂以焦油；玷污 同义词:asphalt, tarre, cloud, pollute They're tarring the lampposts.他们正在用柏油涂料涂抹路灯柱。
n. 味道；品味；审美 vt. 尝；体验 vi. 尝起来；有…的味道 同义词:uner, aesthetic appreciation, experience, degustate Please taste this to see if you like it.请尝尝这个，看看你喜不喜欢。
adj. 技术的；工艺的 It shows that it is not enough to embrace technological change .这个转变说明仅仅是接受技术革新是不够的。
n. 电讯；[通信] 远程通信；无线电通讯 同义词:radiocommunication With development of nearly 3years , M - zone has been a fashion telecommunication brand chased and admired by the young .经过将近3年的发展，动感地带已经成为年轻人追捧的时尚通信品牌。
adj. 望远镜的；[眼科] 远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的 同义词:provident, hyperopic Many tripods are telescopic , particularly those used in mines .许多三角架都是伸缩式的，特别是用于矿山的那种。
n. 速度，发展速度；拍子 同义词:speed, rate, beat The army and marines say morale remains strong but , equally , they say the current tempo cannot go on indefinitely .陆军和陆战队表示士气仍然高涨，然而同样地，现时这种状态不会无限期的继续下去。
n. 承租人；房客；佃户；居住者 vt. 租借（常用于被动语态） 同义词:lessee, renter, rent The house is tenanted by two Chinese students.这所房屋由两个中国学生租住。
vi. 趋向，倾向；照料，照顾 vt. 照料，照管 同义词:trend, affect, attend, attend, mind to tend the sick护理病人
n. 倾向，趋势；癖好 同义词:liability, trend, direction, tide, set Since gravity works equally on everything, there would be a tendency to pull those uneven places down.由于重力作用于物体上是相等的，会有倾向于将受力不相等的地方拉平。
adv. 暂时地；试验性地 同义词:briefly, pro tem If only tentatively so far , it is beginning to act like a big power .假如只是暂时到目前为止，它正开始表现得像是一个强国。
n. 术语；学期；期限；条款 vt. 把…叫做 同义词:technology, item, session, provision, article He has no right to term himself an expert.他无权自称为专家。
vt. 使终止；使结束；解雇 vi. 结束，终止；结果 adj. 结束的 同义词:fulfill, drop, kill, result, drop, determine, pass, set, ended, closing, over, past, concluding to terminate a partnership终止伙伴关系
n. [昆] 白蚁 同义词:white ant Mick Pearce , a Zimbabwean architect living in Melbourne , has been inspired by the humble termite .米克的皮尔斯——现居墨尔本的津巴布韦建筑师，从不起眼的白蚁那里得到了启发。
n. 平台；梯田；阳台 vt. 使成梯田，使成阶地；使有平台屋顶 vi. 成阶地；成梯田；筑成坛 adj. （女服）叠层式的 同义词:platform, balcony a terraced garden梯形花园
n. [法] 证词，证言；证据 同义词:proof, witness The prospect of new testimony and additional Cross-examinations soured him still more .重新作证和更多的盘问的前景使他更加苦恼了。
n. 范围；系链；拴绳 vt. 用绳或链拴住 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, range He tethered a donkey and a horse to a tree.他把一头驴和一匹马拴在一棵树上。
n. 纺织品，织物 adj. 纺织的 同义词:cloth, web, spinning Perhaps I 'd better explain . I represent a very large textile group .也许我最好说明一下。我代表一个很大的纺织品集团。
n. （伦敦的）泰晤士河 It could radically change the view across Thames here in London .它能够从根本上改变伦敦泰晤士河两岸的景象。
n. 电影院，戏院；戏剧；阶梯式讲堂 同义词:drama, stage, cinema The theatre was empty after the show .演出结束后，剧场里空荡荡的。
adv. 理论地；理论上 同义词:notionally Abstract : The method for calculating the optimum detectability of ultrasonic focussing probe theoretically .文摘：从理论上推导了聚焦探头对缺陷最佳检测能力的计算方法。
n. 热力学 It is considered that thermodynamics is an involved subject .人们认为热力学是一门复杂的学科。
n. 论文；论点 同义词:dissertation, tractate We have a grand new thesis of the emerging markets .我们现在得出了一套全新的新兴市场理论。
n. 厚度；层；浓度；含混不清 同义词:concentration, layer, stratum Can all these apparent indications of plate thickness really be mistaken ?所有这些关于板块厚度的明显标志有可能弄错吗？
adv. 向那方；到那边 adj. 对岸的；那边的 同义词:yonder The Bismarck was still four hundred miles from Brest , and no longer even able to steer thither .“俾斯麦”号离布雷斯特仍然有四百英里，它甚至连这么远也行驶不了。
adj. 千分之一的；第一千的 同义词:millesimal A unit of inductance equal to one thousandth ( 10 - 3 ) of a henry .毫亨电感单位，等于千分之一（10-3）亨利。
n. 王座；君主；王权 vi. 登上王座 vt. 使登王位 同义词:emperor, crown, sovereignty Queen Elizabeth Ⅱ was throned in 1952.英国女王伊丽莎白二世于1952年登上王位。
n. 人群；众多 vt. 群集；挤满 vi. 蜂拥而至；群集 adj. 拥挤的 同义词:crowd, mass, burst at the seams, be packed with, host, pack, crowded, jammed The classroom was thronged with students.教室里挤满了学生。
n. [力] 推力；刺 vt. 插；插入；推挤 vi. 插入；用向某人刺去；猛然或用力推 同义词:pushing force, spine, build in, plug in, intervene, build in He thrust his way through the crowd.他冲过人群。
n. 雷；轰隆声；恐吓 vi. 打雷；怒喝 vt. 轰隆地发出；大声喊出 同义词:threat, intimidation, fulminate, bark out, bellow out It is thundering.打雷了。
adj. 不安定的，不稳定的；难对付的；易倒的；易痒的；忌讳的 同义词:tender, unstable This is a ticklish operation .这是一个难以对付的运作。
adj. 潮汐的；潮的，有关潮水的；定时涨落的 This is a tidal wave sweeping away all demons and monsters .这是大海的怒涛，一切妖魔鬼怪都被冲走了。
adj. 整齐的；相当大的 vt. 整理；收拾；弄整齐 vi. 整理；收拾 n. 椅子的背罩 同义词:considerable, ordered, regular, straight, arrange, sort things out, sort things out, put in order We have tidied up the room.我们已经收拾了房间。
adj. 耗时的；旷日持久的 Reversing this trend would be difficult and time-consuming even with political support .即便有政界的支持，扭转趋势也会很艰难，且相当耗时。
n. 定时；调速；时间选择 v. 为…安排时间；测定…的时间（time的ing形式） 同义词:definite time to time an invasion选择入侵的时机
vi. 给小费；翻倒；倾覆 vt. 给小费；倾斜；翻倒；装顶端 n. 小费；尖端 同义词:upset, keel over, slope, keel over, fee, point, apex spears tipped with steel装钢尖的矛
vi. 疲劳；厌倦 vt. 使…疲倦；使…厌烦 n. 轮胎；头饰 同义词:fatigue, be sick of, tucker, headwear, topknot The girl tires easily.这个女孩容易疲劳。
n. 纸巾；薄纱；一套 vt. 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去 同义词:set, gauze a pool tissued with ice水面结薄冰的池塘
n. 辛苦；苦工；网；圈套 vi. 辛苦工作；艰难地行进 vt. 费力地做；使…过度劳累 同义词:web, net, mesh, trap, labour over, sweat to toil for bread为维持生计而辛苦劳作
n. 地势；地形学；地志 同义词:terrain, surface relief The group 's economic geography is as spectacular as its topography .这个组织的经济地理与其地形一样壮观。
n. 奔流；倾注；迸发；连续不断 同义词:transfusion, decantation Not everyone agrees about the cause of this torrent of foreign capital .并非每个人都同意这股外资洪流的成因。
adj. 极权主义的 n. 极权主义者 In present or formerly totalitarian countries , this downward cycle is even more apparent .在当今以及过去的那些极权国家里，这种萧条周期更加明显。
vt. 接触；触动；使轻度受害 vi. 触摸；涉及；接近；提到 n. 接触；触觉；格调；少许 同义词:come in contact with, make contact with, deal with, to relate to, contact, feeling, little Don’t touch the report on my desk.别碰我桌子上的报告。

adj. 艰苦的，困难的；坚强的，不屈不挠的；坚韧的，牢固的；强壮的，结实的 n. 恶棍 vt. 坚持；忍受，忍耐 adv. 强硬地，顽强地 同义词:difficult, strong, hard, rough, firm, varlet, Highbinder, stay, stomach, go, abide, resist, doggedly, pertinaciously to tough the winter out熬过冬天
adj. 有毒的；中毒的 同义词:poisonous, virous The House and Senate each passed bills the next year to control toxic substances .美众议院与参议院各自通过了明年的控制有毒物质的法案。
vi. 追溯；沿路走 vt. 追踪，查探；描绘；回溯 n. 痕迹，踪迹；微量；[仪] 迹线；缰绳 同义词:go back, carry up, represent, figure, trail, suggestion, mark, tail, drop The murderer was traced to Paris.那个凶手被追踪到巴黎。
n. 贸易，交易；行业；职业 vi. 交易，买卖；以物易物 vt. 用…进行交换 同义词:commerce, profession, employment, career, pursuit, traffic, exchange, truck Our company trades with many foreign companies.我们公司和许多外国公司进行贸易。
adv. 传统上；习惯上；传说上 同义词:customarily Graduation is a term traditionally connected with high school or college .毕业生是一个术语传统上联系着高校或大学。
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。
n. 传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送 同义词:gear, driving device These are all examples of transmission principles .这些都是传播法则的例子。
vt. 传输；传播；发射；传达；遗传 vi. 传输；发射信号 同义词:release, send, communicate, project, let go He has transmitted the report to us.他已经把报告传送给我们。
adj. 横向的；横断的；贯轴的 n. 横断面；贯轴；横肌 同义词:lateral, athwartship, cross-section transverse nerves pass to the spiracles of their segment .横神经通往同体节的气门。
n. 治疗，疗法；处理；对待 同义词:therapy, transactions, settlement, disposal, computing Treatment depends on the kind of fracture .治疗方案取决于骨折的类型。
n. 趋势，倾向；走向 vi. 趋向，伸向 vt. 使…趋向 同义词:tendency, tide, direction, liability, set, verge on, tend towards The river trends north.这条河向北流。
n. 侵害者；侵入者；违反者 同义词:intruder, penetrator to trespass upon someone's land未经许可进入某人的地界
n. 部落；族；宗族；一伙 同义词:nationality, clan This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。

n. 诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈 vt. 欺骗；哄骗；装饰；打扮 vi. 哄骗；戏弄 adj. 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的 同义词:scheme, fraud, sell, paint, hang, dress oneself, fox, kid, fool with, deceptive, acrobatic He was tricked out of his pay check.他的薪金给骗走了。
vi. 滴；细细地流；慢慢地移动 vt. 使…滴；使…淌；使…细细地流 n. 滴，淌；细流 同义词:creep, drop, gutta Tears were trickling down her cheeks.泪水不断地从她的面颊淌下来。
adj. 微不足道的；轻浮的 v. 浪费，闲聊（trifle的现在分词） 同义词:bit, negligible, crapping He is not a person to trifle with.他不是好惹的人；他不是可以轻慢的人。
adj. 三倍的；三方的 n. 三倍数；三个一组 vi. 增至三倍 vt. 使成三倍 同义词:trinary, threefold, ternion, triad, trifold, treble They tripled their sales last year.他们去年的销售额增至三倍。
adj. 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的 同义词:small, unimportant Nobody calls these issues trivial — but they are also among the hardest to deal with .没有人认为这些议题是微不足道的——但他们也是最难以处理的问题。
n. 浅薄，轻浮；琐事；平凡 同义词:superficiality, frivolity The triviality of my memory .记忆中的琐事。
n. 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱 vt. 把…放入旅行箱内 adj. 干线的；躯干的；箱子的 同义词:stock, bole, arterial Can I put your bags in trunk first ?我能先将你们的包放到后备箱吗？
n. 龟，甲鱼；海龟 同义词:tortoise, chelonian But what supports turtle ?那乌龟靠什么支持呢？
vi. 打斗；扭打；剧烈的斗争 n. 争斗，扭打 同义词:scuffle, handicuff The old man tussled with the big fish.老人和大鱼进行搏斗。
vt. 使成对 n. 双胞胎中一人 adj. 双胞胎的 vi. 成对；生双胞胎 同义词:conjugate His name will always be twinned with that of our school.他的名字将和我们学校的名字永远联系在一起。
adj. 二维的；缺乏深度的 同义词:planar, bidimensional In reality , the two-dimensional chart of stocks does not hinge on several factors but on thousands of them.在现实中，影响股票的二维图形轨迹的因素不是几个，而是数千个。
adj. 双刃的；有双重不同含义的 同义词:double-edged Let the praise of God be on their lips , and in their hands two-edged swords .愿赞美天主的歌辞在他们的口中，愿双刃的宝剑掌握在他们的手中。
adj. 双重的；两倍的 adv. 双重地；两倍地 同义词:dual, double, double, twifold Mr Zhang says the regime's motives twofold .张教授说该政权具有双重动机。
adj. 极端的；过分的 n. 极端主义者；过激论者；急进论者 同义词:extreme, excessive, tall, extremist At the center is a dense cluster of ultra - sensitive vision cells .在中央，是一团浓密的对景象超级敏感的细胞。
adj. 不受影响的；自然的；真挚的；不矫揉造作的 同义词:natural, spontaneous For now at least , Standard said , exports from Chile may be ' largely unaffected .标准银行称，至少目前智利的出口大部分应该不受影响。
adj. 全体一致的；意见一致的；无异议的 同义词:unobjectionable, undisputed But the near - unanimous verdict in Israel was bitter disappointment .但在以色列近乎一致的观点是有点失望。
adj. 无限的；不受控制的 同义词:huge, infinite, boundless His unbounded courage and compassion made him an excellent leader of the nation .他那无穷的勇气和怜悯心，使他成为国家的优秀领导者。
adj. 无常的；含糊的；靠不住的；迟疑不决的 同义词:changeable, vague Because of this , it is still uncertain who invented TV .正因为此，至今还未能确定是谁发明了电视。
adj. 不成问题的；未引起争论的；[法] 不回避的 同义词:unproblematic, unquestioned He unchallenged within his own Gaullist political family, and has even won new recruits to it.他在自己的戴高乐主义政治党派内说一不二，甚至都招募了一些新的人手。
adj. 无意识的；失去知觉的；不省人事的；未发觉的 同义词:mechanical, automatic, cold, spontaneous A person has collapsed and unconscious .一个人除了事故，并且不省人事。
adj. 未申报的；未经宣布的 同义词:unannounced It is they that most fear an outflow of undeclared funds .正是这些银行最担心未申报资金的流出。
adj. 不可否认的；公认优秀的；无可争辩的 同义词:incontestable, undisputed The Carnival snowballed into an undeniable manifestation for the entire Quebec population .狂欢节丢雪球是魁北克人的代表活动。
n. 暗流；潜流 同义词:potential flow That bright star is not a secret behind the undercurrent ?那闪亮的星光背后是不是有暗暗的潜流？
vt. 强调；在…下面划线；预告 n. 下划线；下期节目预告 同义词:emphasize, stress, highlight to underline a sentence在一个句子的下面画线
adj. 可以理解的；可以了解的 同义词:scrutable Yet the hesitation is understandable .然而，犹豫是可以理解的。

n. 谅解，理解；理解力；协议 adj. 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的 v. 理解；明白（understand的ing形式） 同义词:agreement, intelligence, grasp, protocol, head, intelligent, comprehensive, wise, bright, clever, grasping, comprehending He did not understand the importance of this question.他不理解这个问题的重要性。
n. 毁灭；取消；毁灭的原因 vt. 解开；取消（undo的ing形式） 同义词:destruction, death, withdrawal, cancellation, unbinding He undid his belt because it was too tight.他解开了他的腰带，因为它太紧了。

adj. 过度的，过分的；不适当的；未到期的 同义词:excessive, ultra, tall, unreasonable, unhappy It is tricky to judge when this necessary check on undue caution turns into an incitement to recklessness .当这种对过分谨慎的必要调查转变成不计后果的一个诱因时，很难作出判断。
adv. 过度地；不适当地；不正当地 同义词:wrong, overly Senior Conservatives robustly reject the idea that their campaign is unduly dependent on Mr Cameron .年长的保守党人士严词否认他们的活动过分依赖于卡梅隆。
vt. 推翻；使摔下马来；卸去（驾车的马） 同义词:throw down, topple down She was unhorsed while riding in the garden.她在花园骑马时被马从马背上掀了下来。
adj. 畅通无阻的；未受阻的 同义词:unobstructed, undeterred Now unimpeded , the cells can begin to move around.由于不再受阻，细胞便开始爬动。
adj. 莫明其妙的；无法了解的 同义词:plumbless He continued to shout something unintelligible and bang against the walls .他继续含糊不清地喊着什么，“砰”“砰”地敲打着墙壁。
adv. 独特地；珍奇地 同义词:particularly, inimitably This is not a uniquely British problem : accounting is a global profession — and it needs a global solution .这不是英国独有的问题：会计是一项全球的职业并且需要全球性的解决方案。
adj. 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的 n. 一般概念；普通性 同义词:widespread, entire, corporate, worldwide, current, general concept Use the bamboo very universal in China .在中国使用竹子非常普遍。
adv. 普遍地；人人；到处 同义词:generally, everywhere, around, throughout, about To date , none of these proposals has been universally accepted .但迄今为止，没有任何一个提案被普遍采纳。
adj. 空前的；无前例的 同义词:unheard-of, all-time I think this is an unprecedented time .我认为这是一个空前的时期。
adj. 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的 n. 不可预言的事 同义词:changeable, errant Some economists took the fact that prices were unpredictable to infer that prices were in fact " right ".一些经济学家凭借价格不可预测这一事实，来推断价格实际上是“正确”的。
adj. 未加思量的；不合理的；无理性的；不讲理的 同义词:irrational, brutal Good sense has triumphed over unreasoning impetuosity .清醒的理智战胜了盲目冲动的急躁情绪。
adj. 不可靠的；靠不住的 同义词:uncertain, trustless Unreliable people will be negative about your ideas .你的想法会被不可靠的人否认。
n. 不安；动荡的局面；不安的状态 同义词:tension, unease In the wake of unrest in Tibet in March , a virulently xenophobic mood swept the country .随着三月份的西藏骚乱，一种充满敌意的排外情绪横扫了这个国家。

adj. 不稳定的；动荡的；易变的 同义词:mobile, variable, liquid, volatile That is the level above which , the UN says , the Earth 's climate system would become dangerously unstable .联合国表示，超过这个水平的话，地球气候系统就会处于险境、变得很不稳定。

n. 不稳定；动摇；不规则；古怪 同义词:rolling, instability, flux The novel probe tip reaches the resolution of metallic nano-particle probe , but overcomes the shortcomings of frangibility and unsteadiness .新型光纤探针分辨能力和以往带金尖光纤探针相当，但克服了其易损坏，不稳定的缺点。
n. 虚伪 同义词:hypocrisy, falsity The condition of being mendacious untruthfulness .说谎的状态；
adj. 十足的；说不出口的；无法用言语表达的 同义词:very, dye-in-the-wood In their echoes , there was a tone of unutterable sorrow .他们波动的回声中带有一种难言的悲哀。
n. 支撑物；支持者 同义词:advocate, shorer She upheld her hand reluctantly.她勉强地举起手来。
adv. 向上；在上部；向上游 同义词:up, zenithward Experience also suggests that first estimates of GDP growth are almost always revised upwards .经验也暗示着（每年）第一次GDP增长估值总是一直在向上调整。
adj. 城市的；住在都市的 同义词:city And notice how state and major urban area fusion centres will in future share information .再来看一下各州和主要城市区域融合中心未来将如何共享情报吧。
adj. 紧急的；急迫的 同义词:emergency, instant I cannot consider the matter as in any way urgent .我不能用紧急的方式来考虑这件事情。
adj. 功利的；功利主义的；实利的 n. 功利主义者 " We see it as a purely utilitarian initiative, " he says .他说：“我们仅是单纯地视其为一个实用主义策略。”
n. 利用，使用 同义词:employment, usage, exploitation, use We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
n. 极限；最大可能 adj. 极度的；最远的 同义词:limitation, threshold, terminal, excessive, extreme The child tried his patience to the utmost .孩子闹得他都几乎没有耐心了。
vt. 发出，表达；发射 adj. 完全的；彻底的；无条件的 同义词:release, put, voice, project, let go, thorough, full, complete, absolute, total He could not utter a word.他什么话也讲不出来。

adv. 完全地；绝对地；全然地；彻底地，十足地 同义词:totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, fully, strictly Today the notion of forever concealing the murder of many millions of people may seem utterly crazy .今天，要想永远掩盖起对于百万人的屠杀，这种想法似乎是荒唐透顶的。
adj. 徒劳的；虚荣的；空虚的 同义词:empty, blank They protested to the President but in vain .他们向总统提抗议，但没有结果。
n. 先锋；前锋；先驱；领导者 同义词:leader, Moses, pioneer Behind the vanguard were 38 columns guarding 38 four- horse chariots .在前锋的后面是38列纵队，护卫着38辆四马战车。
vi. 消失；突然不见；成为零 vt. 使不见，使消失 n. 弱化音 同义词:disappear, blank, unmake The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
n. 销声匿迹，无影无踪（美国电视连续剧剧名） The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
adj. 不同的；多样的 n. 变体；转化 同义词:different, diverse, unlike, multiple, varying, transformation, converting A variant reading or transcription of a text or copy.第一个要求是给我们寄来你的文凭副本。
vi. 变化；变异；违反 vt. 改变；使多样化；变奏 同义词:pass, change from, influence, fashion, shift, innovate I can vary the speed at will.我可以随意改变速度。
adv. 极大地；广大地；深远地 同义词:extensively, immensely This ability to place information into patterns , or chunks, vastly improves memory skills .这种把信息分成各种类别的能力极大地提高了记忆力。
n. [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物 同义词:instrument, engine, tool, gear, implement It subsequently evolved into an even more complex investment vehicle .并随后发展成为一种更为复杂的投资载体。
n. 血管；叶脉；[地质] 岩脉；纹理；翅脉；性情 vt. 使成脉络；象脉络般分布于 同义词:vessel, texture, grain, nerve, disposition The countryside is veined by new broad highways.乡村地区密布四通八达的宽阔的新公路。
n. 毒液；恶意 vt. 使有毒；放毒 同义词:spite, malice, envenom He lowered his voice and said with venom over his lemon squash.他把声音压低，一边喝柠檬汁一边恶狠狠地说着。
vt. 敢于 vi. 冒险；投机 n. 企业；风险；冒险 同义词:dare to, be bold to, adventure, take a risk, enterprise, risk, undertaking, throw Men ventured their lives in war.人们在战争中冒着生命的危险。
n. [天] 金星；维纳斯（爱与美的女神） Lightning on Venus was discovered in the atmosphere .在大气中发现了金星上的闪电。

adj. 口头的；言语的；动词的；照字面的 n. 动词的非谓语形式 同义词:oral, spoken Verbal intervention on the dollar and euro is welcome – but it is time for verbal intervention on the rupee and renminbi as well.口头干预美元兑欧元汇率是受欢迎的，但目前也到了口头干预印度卢比和人民币汇率的时候。
vi. 濒临，接近；处在边缘 n. 边缘 同义词:go on for, come close to, margin, brink, suburb, beaded edge He had taken over an old company verging on liquidation.他接办了一家行将破产的老公司。
adj. 本国的；地方的；用本地语写成的 n. 本地话，方言；动植物的俗名 同义词:native, patrial, provincialism, patois The vitality of Latin was doomed to wane before the rivalry of the vernacular tongue .拉丁语的持续性遇到本国语言的竞争而注定衰弱。
adj. 脊椎动物的；有脊椎的 n. 脊椎动物 同义词:backboned, amniote Of or characteristic of vertebrates or a vertebrate .贪婪是一个守财奴的主要特点。
adj. 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的 n. 垂直线，垂直面 同义词:standing, perpendicular, perpendicular plane, perpendicular line We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
adj. 恶毒的；恶意的；堕落的；有错误的；品性不端的；剧烈的 同义词:severe, fallen, malicious, poisonous That can create a vicious circle .这造成了一个恶性循环。
vi. 争；竞争 vt. 使针锋相对；提出...来竞争；以...作较量 同义词:contest, cope The two teams are vying for the championship.这两个队正在争夺冠军。
n. 观察；视野；意见；风景 vt. 观察；考虑；查看 同义词:observation, opinion, scenery, scope, comment, watch, study, regard, think of, think about We will go and view the house before we buy it.在买房前我们先去看一看房子。

adj. 有力的；精力充沛的 同义词:male, live, energetic, mighty The efficacy of an alarm clock is explained as a very vigorous sensory input that triggers a large , synchronous assembly .闹钟铃声之所以有效，可以解释成一个非常强大的感觉输入，引发一个大的同步组合。
n. 活力；气势 同义词:vitality, energy, spring Would a French company have been pursued with such vigour ?难道微软公司会如此青睐这样一个法国公司？
adj. 暴力的；猛烈的 同义词:fierce, hard Violent crust movements always happen near the continental shelf.陆坡区域的地壳经常出现剧烈的活动。
n. 毒蛇；毒如蛇蝎的人，阴险的人 同义词:snake, rat-face He unwarily treads upon a viper asleep just before his feet .他不小心踩到正睡在他脚前的蛇上。
adj. 毒蛇的 That woman has the most viperine tongue !那个女人有最恶毒的舌头！
adj. 处女的；纯洁的；未经利用的，处于原始状态的 n. 处女 同义词:stainless, pure, white, Parthenos, demi-vierge The peasant girl adores the statue of Virgin Mary .这个农家姑娘非常崇拜圣母玛丽亚的塑像。
adj. [计] 虚拟的；有效的；实质上的，事实上的 同义词:valid, available, effective, telling, significant Experiments are easy because virtual worlds exist in parallel .实验是容易的，因为虚拟世界并行存在。
n. [病毒] 病毒；恶毒；毒害 同义词:vindictiveness, Vyrus I talked to you over the computer , and you gave me a virus .我通过计算机跟你交谈，你竟然传染给我一个病毒。
adj. 明显的；看得见的；现有的；可得到的 n. 可见物；进出口贸易中的有形项目 同义词:obvious, distinct, seen, evident The damage is visible .损害是显而易见的。
n. 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力 vt. 想象；显现；梦见 同义词:sight, imagination, eye, seeing, eyesight, image, envision He tried to vision himself in a past century.他假想自己身处百年之前。
vt. 形象，形象化；想像，设想 vi. 显现 同义词:imagine, picture, think of I cannot visualize what he looked like.我想像不出他是什么样子。
n. 活力，生气；生命力，生动性 同义词:animation, pet, spring, vigor On every front there are young people abounding in vigor vitality .在各条战线上都有精力充沛朝气蓬勃的青年人。
adj. 生机勃勃的 v. 使有生气（vivify的ing形式） 同义词:lifeful, burgeoning to vivify an idea with wit用机智使概念更为生动
n. 职业；天职；天命；神召 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, pursuit, occupation Mr Chandler could easily have missed his vocation .钱德勒本可以很容易地错过他的职业。
n. 大满贯；野鼠 vi. 赢得大满贯 同义词:Slamvan, grand slam This time , the vole escapes .这次，田鼠逃过一劫。

n. 量；体积；卷；音量；大量；册 adj. 大量的 vi. 成团卷起 vt. 把…收集成卷 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, bulk, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much Coal is the biggest single cargo , accounting for 45% by volume and 23% by value .煤炭是最大的单一运输货物，占总货运体积的45%和货运总值的23%。
n. 投票，选举；选票；得票数 vt. 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认 vi. 选举，投票 同义词:election, poll, make the offer, propone, poll I didn't vote in the last election.上次选举时我没投票。
adj. 粗俗的；通俗的；本土的 n. 平民，百姓 同义词:popular, low, mainland, coarse, informal, populace, common man There is very little that could be vulgar in Disney World .迪斯尼世界几乎没有低级趣味的东西。
adj. 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的 同义词:sensitive, assailable But modern humans were more vulnerable to the cold .但是现代人更容易受到寒冷的攻击。
n. 工薪族；靠工资生活的人 Both the husband and wife are wage-earner .夫妻俩都是工薪阶层。

adj. 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的 n. 闲逛；离题；神志恍惚 v. 漫游；闲逛（wander的ing形式） 同义词:ragamuffinly, migratory, fooling around, off the point, gallivanting Wandering from all mortal reason , man comes at last to that celestial thought .人一失去了所有的性命悠关的理性，就不免要有升天的念头。

adj. 遭受战争破坏的 White House officials say the phrase no longer captures the dynamism of the tactics ( America and its allies are employing in the war - torn region .白宫官员表示这个词已经不再能反映出美国及其盟友在这个饱受战争折磨的地区所运用的战术的变化。
n. 战争；冲突 同义词:war, interference, sword, conflict, collision The lethal power of the air in U- boat warfare was yet to come .在潜艇战中，空军的致敌于死命的威力还没有发挥出来。
n. 战士，勇士；鼓吹战争的人 同义词:champion, fighter, brave The death of one warrior will not cast a cloud between them forever .尽管一位战士死了，但他们之间决不会永远蒙上阴影的。
adj. 谨慎的；机警的；惟恐的；考虑周到的 同义词:cautious, prudent Many are wary of capital inflows , having been hit by their reversal in the past .许多国家对资金流入小心谨慎，它们在过去遭到撤资的打击。
adv. 浪费地；挥霍地 同义词:prodigally, lavishly In Poland , these include wastefully untargeted social benefits such as early retirement .在波兰，这包括提前退休而挥霍社会保障金等。
n. 水；海水；雨水；海域，大片的水 vt. 使湿；供以水；给…浇水 vi. 加水；流泪 同义词:seawater, eau, shed tears, pipe one's eye to water livestock给家畜饮水
adj. 涝的；浸满水的，吸饱水的 v. 进水；浸满水（waterlog的过去分词） 同义词:afloat The baseball field is waterlogged so the match have to is cancelled .棒球场浸了水，湿漉漉的，所以比赛只好取消。
n. [物] 波长 Sectors of it represent corresponding fractions of a wavelength .它的各个弧段则代表一个波长的相应分数。
n. 疲倦，疲劳；厌倦 同义词:fatigue, tiredness Mary wouldn't admit how much the children wearied her.玛丽无法容忍孩子们对她的烦扰。
vt. 权衡；考虑；称…重量 vi. 重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚 n. 权衡；称重量 同义词:view, measure, study, regard, think of, break ground, trade-off to weigh oneself on the scales在磅秤上称自己的体重
n. 加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴 v. 加权；称量（weight的现在分词） 同义词:measuring, scalage Two , its indexing and weighting methods produced superior ranking results .第二，它的索引与加权方式能够产生优良的排行结果。
n. 堰，坝；鱼梁（指拦截游鱼的枝条篱） 同义词:lasher, kiddle For example , Feisha weir design is a very good use of a roundabout flow theory .比如飞沙堰的设计就是很好地运用了回旋流的理论。
n. 福利；幸福；福利事业；安宁 adj. 福利的；接受社会救济的 同义词:happiness, weal " They will create the perfect welfare state , " he says .他说：「它们会创造出完美的福利国家。」
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地 adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的 n. 井；源泉 同义词:fully, properly, fine, adequately, wide, healthy, favorable, robust, fine, fit, principle, fountain I felt tears well up in my eyes.我感到眼泪涌出我的双眼。

n. 西部片（western的复数形式）；美国西部地区的人；西部电影或小说 Heirs to a strong equestrian culture , Afghanis were said by some visitors at the time to be particularly fond of the hard riding in American Westerns .作为一个马背上的民族的后嗣，那个时期从阿富汗回来的人说当地人很喜欢美国西部的马背生活。
adj. 古怪的；异想天开的；反复无常的 同义词:odd, curious It may vary in mood from the whimsical , even playful , to the tragic and passionate .它可以表现不同的情绪，从怪诞的、幽默滑稽的到悲怆的和热情的。
n. 怪念头；反复无常 同义词:inconstancy, caprice Remarks : Beautiful young people are the whimsy of nature , but beautiful old people are true works of art .领事寄语：美丽的年轻人是大自然的奇想，而美丽的老年人却是艺术的杰作。
adj. 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的 同义词:extensive, universal, comprehensive, ruling, generalized Its memory is the embryonic form of the widespread now virtual memory .它的存储器是现在广为采用的虚拟存储器的雏形。
n. 地下党 She wields two languages in her office.她在办公室里使用两种语言。
n. 假发；要人；头脑 vt. 使戴假发；斥责 vi. 激动；发狂 同义词:brain, personage, tongue, carpet, warm, fire The wig is tied in a ponytail in the back .这个假发在后面梳成马尾辫。
n. 荒地；大量，茫茫一片 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, body Perhaps , some day, the Sinai will emerge from its years in the wilderness .也许，假以时日，西奈人会从多年的沉寂与荒芜中走出来。
vt. 剔出；费劲找出 n. 食用螺 vi. 闪耀 同义词:shine on, flare He seemed to winkle something out from inside his shoe.他好像从鞋里挖出了点儿什么。
vt. 撤退；收回；撤消；拉开 vi. 撤退；离开 同义词:beat a retreat, bug out, leave, split a government decision to withdraw funding一项撤销政府财政支持的决定

adj.
思路混乱的；懵懂的；糊里糊涂的
n. 作用；工作方式；操作（working的复数） 同义词:roles, influences to work for a living谋生
n. 车间；研讨会；工场；讲习班 同义词:plant, proseminar If China is emitting ever more carbon , that is partly because it has become the workshop ofthe world .如果中国继续排放更多的二氧化碳，那部分原因是因为它已经变成了世界工厂。
adj. 疲倦的；用旧的 v. 穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴 同义词:tired, harassed, frayed On the first day he went to school,the boy wore his school cap proudly.上学的第一天，男孩骄傲地戴上了他的校帽。
n. 崇拜；礼拜；尊敬 vt. 崇拜；尊敬；爱慕 vi. 拜神；做礼拜 同义词:respect, church, praise, exercise, honor, love, regard, go to church to worship reverently虔诚地崇拜
n. 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人 vt. 破坏；使失事；拆毁 vi. 失事；营救失事船只 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting, remain, disruption, destroy, undermine, founder My car was completely wrecked in the accident.我的车在这次车祸中彻底毁了。
vi. 蠕动；蜿蜒而行 vt. 使蠕动；蠕动到；不知不觉地潜入 n. 蠕动；扭动 同义词:squirm, worm, peristalsis, crawing To wriggle is to wrest about like a worm.蠕动就是像虫子一样扭来扭去。

adj. 每年的 adv. 每年；一年一次 n. 年刊；年鉴 同义词:annual, etesian, annually, annual, year book But estimates of when that will happen are as scattered , or more , than the yearly predictions .但是至于何时发生的预测依然各持其说，或着比年度海冰预测更加散乱。
n. 酵母；泡沫；酵母片；引起骚动因素 同义词:bubble, foam The vacuoles of yeast cells represents persistent organelles .酵母细胞的液泡是永久性的细胞器。
vt. 屈服；出产；放弃 vi. 屈服，投降 n. 产量；收益 同义词:desert, quit, succumb, to surrender, crop, output, harvest, proceeds an orchard that yielded a good crop收成好的果园
n. 动物学家 Local people thought the zoologist was an evil person and the jury decided he was guilty .当地人认为动物学家是个邪恶的人，陪审团也裁定他有罪。
